44009031	Ndeen kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal heɓi jam ley Yahuudiya e Galili, kam e Samariya fuu. Ngal ɓeydi semmbe, ngal yehi yeeso e kulol Joomiraaɗo, ngal ɓeydii heewude saabe ballal Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
44009032	Piyeer ina yiiloo e ley leydi ndiin fuu. O jippanii seniiɓe wonɓe Lidda ɓeen du.
44009033	O tawi toon gorko nyawɗo mo ɓanndu muuɗum fuu waati, bi'eteeɗo Eneya. O waɗii duuɓi jeetati imo waalii.
44009034	Piyeer wi'i mo: —Eneya, Iisaa Almasiihu dannii ma! Umma, moƴƴin daɗɗo maa! Wakkati oon pay, o ummii.
44009035	Wonɓe Lidda e ngenndi Saron fuu nji'i mo, de tuubani Joomiraaɗo.
44009036	Ley wuro Joffe ina woodi taalibaajo debbo bi'eteeɗo Tabita (maanaa majjum woni «Lewla»). Ɗum woni Dorkas e geresankoore. Imo golla golleeji lobbi, imo waɗana talkaaɓe moƴƴere.
44009037	E balɗe ɗeen o nyawi, o maayi. O lootaa, de o wallinaa ley suudu sooro tafon.
44009038	Wuro Joffe ngoon woɗɗunduraa e Lidda, wooɗi du, taalibaaɓe ɓeen nani Piyeer ina woni to Lidda toon. Ndelle ɓe neli worɓe ɗiɗo ŋaaroo mo o yottoo ɗum'en law.
44009039	Piyeer ummii, yaadi e maɓɓe. Nde ɓe njottinoo ndeen, ɓe njaari mo ley suudu sooro toon. Rewɓe talka'en ɓe goriraaɓe muɓɓen maayi ɓeen fuu ɓattii ɗum ina mboya, ina kolla ɗum saayaaji e kaddule goɗɗe ɗe Dorkas nyo'unoo nde wondunoo e muɓɓen ndeen.
44009040	Piyeer wurtini yimɓe ɓeen fuu, hofii, ina du'oo. Caggal ɗuum, hucciti e maayɗo oon, wi'i: —Tabita, umma! Ndeen Tabita feerti gite muuɗum, yi'i Piyeer, ummii jooɗii.
44009041	Piyeer nanngi junngo makko, ummini mo. Caggal ɗuum, o noddi seniiɓe ɓeen e rewɓe talkaaɓe ɓeen, o holli ɗum'en Tabita wo buurɗo.
44009042	Ɗum nanaama e ley Joffe fuu, heewɓe ngoonɗini Joomiraaɗo.
44009043	Piyeer ɓooyti Joffe balɗe keewɗe to ceeloowo guri bi'eteeɗo Simon.
44010001	Ley Kaysariya ina woodi gorko bi'eteeɗo Korneliyus. O mawɗo fedde sordaasi'en wi'eteende «fedde Italiyankooɓe».
44010002	O tinniiɗo e diina, kanko e koreeji makko fuu ɓe hulɓe Laamɗo. Imo sakkana Alhuudiyankooɓe sadakaaji keewɗi, imo waɗa du'aare to Laamɗo wakkati fuu.
44010003	Nyannde gomma wakkati yamnde tati, o yi'i e ley holleede maleyka ina naata suudu makko. Maleyka oon ina wi'a mo: —Korneliyus!
44010004	O ndaari ɗum faa wooɗi, o huli, o wi'i ɗum: —Joomam, ɗume? Maleyka oon wi'i mo: —Du'aawuuji maa e sadakaaji ɗi ngaɗanɗaa talkaaɓe ɗiin ina mbeli Laamɗo. Laamɗo yeggitaay ma.
44010005	Nulu joonin worɓe to wuro Joffe, faa noddowa Simon, bi'eteeɗo Piyeer.
44010006	Imo jippii to ceeloowo guri bi'eteeɗo Simon, mo suudu muuɗum hetti e maayo manngo.
44010007	Nde maleyka kaaldannooɗo e makko oon dillunoo ndeen, o noddi gollooɓe makko ɗiɗo e sordaasi gooto kulɗo Laamɗo jeyaaɗo e howruuɓe makko.
44010008	O haalani ɓe ko maleyka oon wi'i ɗuum fuu, o neli ɓe Joffe.
44010009	Jaango majjum, iɓe ngoni e laawol. Nde worɓe tato ɓeen ɓattinoo wuro ngoon ndeen, Piyeer ƴeeŋi dow suudu ɗo weeri ɗoon wakkati hakkunde naange faa waɗa du'aare.
44010010	O yolbii sanne, imo yiɗi nyaamude. Nde ɓe moƴƴinanta o nyaamdu ndeen, Laamɗo holli mo.
44010011	O yi'i kammu udditii, de huunde wa'unde hono disaare mawnde ina jippinee e leydi. Coɓɓuli muuɗum nay fuu ina kaɓɓaa.
44010012	Sii daabaaji fuu ɗi koyɗe nay, e kulle ladooje, kam e sii pooli fuu ina ngoni e mayre.
44010013	Daande wi'i mo: —Piyeer, umma, hirsu, nyaam!
44010014	Piyeer wi'i: —A'aa, abada Joomiraaɗo! Abada mi nyaamaay ko harmi naa ko tuuni.
44010015	Daande ndeen wi'i mo katin: —Taa harmin ko Laamɗo laaɓini.
44010016	Ɗum waɗi noon kile tati. Ndeen disaare ndeen ƴeentinaa dow kammu.
44010017	Piyeer ina wemmbii dow ko hollaa ɗuum, ko ɗum fiirtata. Tawi worɓe ɓe Korneliyus nelunoo ɓeen, ƴamiino galle Simon, de joonin ɓe ngari. Ɓe ndarii e dammbugal.
44010018	Ɓe noddi, ɓe ƴami yalla Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyeer ɗoon jippii.
44010019	Piyeer ina heddii na miiloo dow ko yi'i ɗuum, faa Ruuhu wi'i ɗum: —Worɓe tato ina pile.
44010020	Umma, jippa, njaadaa e maɓɓe tawa a sikkitiraay, sabo miin nuli ɓe.
44010021	Piyeer jippii, wi'i worɓe ɓeen: —Inani kam, miin woni mo pilotoɗon oon. Ɗume waddi on?
44010022	Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Korneliyus mawɗo sordaasi'en neli min. O gorko dartiiɗo, kulɗo Laamɗo, mo lenyol Alhuudiyankooɓe fuu seedanii moƴƴere. Maleyka ceniiɗo yamirii mo min nodde, ngaraa suudu makko, faa o nana waaju maaɗa.
44010023	Piyeer silmini ɓe, weerni ɓe jemma oon. Jaango majjum, o ummii, o dillidi e maɓɓe. Sakiraaɓe woɓɓe jeyaaɓe Joffe njaadi e makko.
44010024	Jaango majjum katin ɓe njottii ngalluure Kaysariya. Korneliyus ina heɗinoo ɓe, noddi sakiraaɓe muuɗum e yigiraaɓe muuɗum ɓadiiɓe.
44010025	Nde Piyeer naatannoo ndeen, Korneliyus jaɓɓii ɗum, sujidani ɗum.
44010026	De Piyeer ummini mo, wi'i: —Umma, sabo miin du mi neɗɗo tan.
44010027	Piyeer ina haalda e makko, faa ɓe naati suudu nduun, tawi toon yimɓe heewɓe ina kawriti.
44010028	O wi'i ɓe: —Oɗon anndi daganaaki Alhuudiyanke jokkundura e mo wanaa Alhuudiyanke, naa weerande ɗum. Ammaa Laamɗo hollii kam taa mi ndaarda fay gooto karmuɗo naa tuunɗo.
44010029	Ɗum waɗi nde nelanɗon kam ndeen, mi warii, mi salaaki. Ɗum le, kaalanee kam, saabe ɗume noddirɗon kam?
44010030	Korneliyus jaabii, wi'i: —Hannden woni balɗe nay, miɗo waɗa du'aare ley suudu am e wakkati hono o, yamnde tati ni, faa gorko mo kaddule jalbooje wari, darii yeeso am,
44010031	wi'i: «Korneliyus, Laamɗo jaabanake ma du'aawuuji maa e sadakaaji maa.
44010032	Joonin, nulu e wuro wi'eteengo Joffe, noddaneɗaa Simon, bi'eteeɗo Piyeer. Imo jippii to ceeloowo guri bi'eteeɗo Simon, mo suudu muuɗum hetti e maayo manngo.»
44010033	Ɗum waɗi de nelumi noddoweɗaa wakkati oon. A gaynii ko ngarɗaa ɗuum. Joonin min fuu inani min yeeso Laamɗo faa min kettindoo ko Joomiraaɗo yamiri ma mbaajoɗaa min fuu.
44010034	Ndeen Piyeer fuɗɗi haalude, wi'i: —Joonin mi yi'ii goonga jaati Laamɗo ɓurdintaa yimɓe.
44010035	Neɗɗo kuloowo mo, gaɗoowo ko fonnditii, o jaɓan ɗum ko lenyol muuɗum laatii fuu.
44010036	Oɗon anndi konngol ngol Laamɗo nuldi ɓiɓɓe Israa'iila ngool. Konngol lobbol ngool na holla jam na heɓiree saabe Iisaa Almasiihu, kam woni Joomiraaɗo yimɓe fuu.
44010037	Oɗon anndi kabaaru o huuɓii leydi Yahuudiya fuu. Ɗum fuɗɗii gilla Galili, caggal ko Yaayaa waajii yimɓe loote batisima.
44010038	Oɗon anndi no Laamɗo suɓorii Iisaa Nasaraatuujo oon, no jippiniri e muuɗum Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e baawɗe. Oɗon anndi no Iisaa yiilorii e nokkuuje fuu ina golla golleeji lobbi, ina danna ɓe Ibiliisa jaalii na torra fuu, sabo Laamɗo ina wondi e muuɗum.
44010039	Minen, min seedeeɓe ko o golli Yahuudiya e ko o golli Urusaliima fuu. Ɓe ɓili o e leggal palaangal, ɓe mbari mo.
44010040	Ammaa Laamɗo iirtinii mo nyannde tataɓerde, de ɓangini mo hakkunde amin.
44010041	Kaa wanaa yimɓe fuu o ɓangani. O ɓanganii seedeeɓe ɓe Laamɗo artii suɓaade ɓeen, minen nyaamduɓe e makko de njardi e makko caggal iirtagol makko ɓeen.
44010042	O yamirii min mbaajoo yimɓe, min ceedoo kanko woni mo Laamɗo waɗi carotooɗo wuurɓe e maayɓe.
44010043	Kanko du woni mo annabaaɓe fuu ceedanii, mbi'i goonɗinɗo mo fuu heɓan yaafaneede hakkeeji muuɗum saabe innde makko.
44010044	Wakkati Piyeer waajotoo waaju oon ndeen, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii e hettindiiɓe ɓeen fuu.
44010045	Alhuudiyankooɓe goonɗinɓe wardunooɓe e Piyeer ɓeen fuu ɗum haaynii ɗum'en, no dokkal Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ngaal saakorii e yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe ni.
44010046	Sabo iɓe nana yimɓe ɓeen ina kaala e ɗemle janane, na njetta Laamɗo. Ndeen, Piyeer jaabii, wi'i:
44010047	—Yimɓe ɓeen keɓii Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hono no meeɗen ni. Moy waawi haɗude ɓe looteede lootagal batisima?
44010048	O yamiri ɓe mbatisiree e innde Iisaa Almasiihu. Caggal ɗuum, ɓe nyaagii mo o wonda e maɓɓe balɗe seeɗa.
44011001	Nulaaɓe e sakiraaɓe wonɓe Yahuudiya ɓeen nani yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe du keɓii konngol Laamɗo.
44011002	Nde Piyeer ƴeentunoo Urusaliima fu, goonɗinɓe tilsinɓe taadagol ɓeen peli ɗum,
44011003	mbi'i: —A jippanake yimɓe ɓe taadaaki, a nyaamdii e muɓɓen!
44011004	Ndeen Piyeer haalani ɓe ko waɗi ɗuum gilla e fuɗɗoode faa e timmoode, wi'i:
44011005	—Wuro Joffe ngonnoomi, miɗo du'oo faa nji'umi e ley holleede huunde ɓanganii kam. Huunde wa'unde hono disaare mawnde nde coɓɓuli muuɗum nay fuu kaɓɓaa, ina jippinee ƴuuwde e kammu warde to am.
44011006	Taykiimi nde faa wooɗi, nji'umi daabaaji fuu ɗi koyɗe nay, e kulle ladde e ladooje e sii pooli fuu.
44011007	Nanumi daande ina wi'a kam: «Piyeer, umma, hirsu, nyaam!»
44011008	Mbiimi: «A'aa, abada Joomiraaɗo! Abada mi nyaamaay ko harmi naa ko tuuni.»
44011009	Daande dow kammu ndeen jaabitii kam katin, wi'i: «Taa harmin ko Laamɗo laaɓini.»
44011010	Ɗum waɗi noon kile tati. Caggal ɗuum, kulle ɗeen fuu ƴeentinaa dow kammu.
44011011	De wakkati oon pay, worɓe tato nulaaɓe to am ƴuuruɓe Kaysariya ngari to suudu ɗo min ngonnoo ɗoon.
44011012	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i kam mi yaada e maɓɓe taa mi sikkitira fay huunde. Sakiraaɓe njeegomo ɓee ɗo njaadi e am, de min naaddi suudu Korneliyus.
44011013	O haalani min no o yiiri maleyka ina darii ley suudu makko ina wi'a mo: «Nulu e wuro wi'eteengo Joffe noddaneɗaa Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyeer.
44011014	O haalante haalaaji kisinoowo ma, aan e koreeji maa fuu.»
44011015	Nde puɗɗumi haalude ndeen, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii e maɓɓe hono no jipporinoo e meeɗen arande ni.
44011016	Ndeen, miccitiimi konngol ngol Joomiraaɗo wi'unoo: «Yaayaa batisirannoo ndiyam, ammaa onon, on mbatisirte Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.»
44011017	Si Laamɗo fonndii en e maɓɓe, hokkii ɓe ko hokkunoo en ɗuum nde ngoonɗinnoɗen Joommen Iisaa Almasiihu ndeen, ndelle miin wo mi moy? Yalla miɗo waawi haɗude Laamɗo naa?
44011018	Nde ɓe nannoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe ndeƴƴinii, iɓe njetta Laamɗo, iɓe mbi'a: —Laamɗo tuubinii yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe du faa keɓa nguurndam ngoongalajam.
44011019	Nde Etiyen waranoo ndeen, goonɗinɓe torraama faa cankitii. Woɓɓe njehi faa Finisi e Kipirus e Antiyoki. Iɓe mbaajoo Alhuudiyankooɓe tan konngol ngool.
44011020	Ammaa goonɗinɓe woɓɓe ƴuurooɓe Kipirus e Sireene naati Antiyoki ina mbaajoo Kabaaru Lobbo haala Iisaa Joomiraaɗo oon hakkunde Geresankooɓe.
44011021	Baawɗe Joomiraaɗo ina ngondi e maɓɓe. Yimɓe heewɓe ngoonɗini, tuubi, ngarti to Joomiraaɗo.
44011022	Kawrital goonɗinɓe wonɓe Urusaliima ngaal nani kabaaru gaɗuɗo Antiyoki oon, neli toon Barnabas.
44011023	Nde oon yottinoo de yi'i e maɓɓe moƴƴere Laamɗo fu, seyii, tindini ɓe fuu ɓe tinnoo, ɓe tabita e Joomiraaɗo e ɓerɗe laaɓuɗe.
44011024	Barnabas wo gorko lobbo, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e goonɗinal. Jamaa keewɗo goonɗini Joomiraaɗo saabe makko.
44011025	Caggal ɗuum, Barnabas yehi Tarsus faa filowoo Sool.
44011026	Nde o yiitunoo ɗum ndeen, o yaari ɗum Antiyoki. Ɓe ngondi e kawrital goonɗinɓe wonɓe toon ɓeen hitaande hiɓɓunde, ɓe njanngini yimɓe heewɓe. Taalibaaɓe wonɓe Antiyoki ɓeen artii fuu wi'eede Almasiyankooɓe.
44011027	E balɗe ɗeen, annabaaɓe ley goonɗinɓe ƴuurii Urusaliima ngari Antiyoki.
44011028	Gooto maɓɓe bi'eteeɗo Agabus, ummii, darii, holliri saabe Ruuhu rafo manngo waɗan ley laamu Roma fuu. (Wooɗi, rafo ngoon waɗii e laamu kaananke mawɗo bi'eteeɗo Kalawdiyus.)
44011029	Taalibaaɓe ɓeen anniyii hawrundurde mballa, mono fuu ko waawi, faa ɓe nelda sakiraaɓe maɓɓe wonɓe Yahuudiya ɓeen.
44011030	Ɓe ngaɗi ɗum, ɓe nuldi mballa kaan e juuɗe Barnabas e Sool faa kokkowa mawɓe kawrital Urusaliima.
44012001	Wakkati oon, kaananke bi'eteeɗo Hirudus fuɗɗi torrude woɓɓe ley kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal.
44012002	O yamiri Yaakuuba sakiike Yuhanna oon wardee kaafaahi.
44012003	Nde o yiinoo iɗum weli Alhuudiyankooɓe ndeen, o nanngi Piyeer du. Ɗum hawri e wakkati iidi buuru mo wattaaka rabilla.
44012004	Nde o nanngunoo Piyeer ndeen, o ommbi ɗum ley kasu. O yamiri pecce sordaasiiɓe nay loomtundura e haybugol ɗum, fedde fuu yimɓe nayo. O anniyii yaarude ɗum yeeso yimɓe fuu, si iidi Faltagol tilake.
44012005	Ɗum waɗi de Piyeer haybaa e ley kasu nguun, ammaa kawrital goonɗinɓe ngal selaay nyaaganaade mo Laamɗo.
44012006	Nde Hirudus anniyinoo yaarude mo sariya ndeen, jemma oon imo ɗaanii hakkunde sordaasiiɓe ɗiɗo, imo haɓɓiraa callali ɗiɗi. Ndaarooɓe woɓɓe du ina kayba dammbugal kasu ɗoon.
44012007	Wakkati oon, maleyka Joomiraaɗo wari to makko, annoora yayni ley suudu nduun. Maleyka meemi mo, findini mo, wi'i: —Umma law! Ndeen callali ɗiin kaɓɓitii, ƴuwi e juuɗe makko, caami.
44012008	Maleyka oon wi'i mo: —Haɓɓa kaɓɓorgol maa, ɓorna paɗe maa. Piyeer waɗiri noon. Maleyka oon wi'i mo: —Waana suddamaare maa, njokkaa kam.
44012009	Piyeer wurtii, jokki mo, de o faamaay ko maleyka oon waɗata ɗuum wo goonga. Imo miiloo wo o yi'u ɗum ley holleede.
44012010	Ɓe paltii kayboowo arandeejo oon e ɗiɗaɓo fuu. Ɓe njottii dammbugal njamndi naarrugal ngalluure ndeen. Ngal omtanii hoore maggal yeeso maɓɓe. Ɓe njalti, ɓe njokki laawol ngool. Wakkati oon, maleyka oon seedi e makko.
44012011	Hakkillo Piyeer warti, wi'i: —Joonin mi tannyorii Joomiraaɗo nuli maleyka muuɗum, faa hisina kam e junngo Hirudus e ko Alhuudiyankooɓe njelinoo faa mi waɗee fuu.
44012012	Nde o faamunoo ko waɗi fu, o yehi suudu Mariyama, inna Yuhanna bi'eteeɗo Marku. Toon yimɓe heewɓe kawriti ina ngaɗa du'aare.
44012013	Nde Piyeer gokkinoo dammbugal galle toon ndeen, golloowo debbo bi'eteeɗo Roda ɓattitii faa ndaara wo moy.
44012014	Nde o annditinnoo daande Piyeer ndeen, o yeggiti omtude dammbugal ngaal no o foti seyaade. O doggi, o naatowi, o humpiti ɓe wo Piyeer darii dammbugal toon.
44012015	Ɓe mbi'i mo: —A kaaŋaaɗo! Ammaa imo heddii siinude sikke walaa wo ɗum Piyeer. Ɓe mbi'i katin: —Ɗum wo maleyka makko.
44012016	De ɗum fuu Piyeer ina heddii ina gokkoo. Nde ɓe udditinnoo, ɓe njiinoo mo ndeen, ɗum haaynii ɓe sanne.
44012017	O huncani ɓe junngo faa ɓe ndeƴƴinoo, o fillanii ɓe no Joomiraaɗo yaltiniri mo kasu, o wi'i: —Kaalanee ɗum Yaakuuba, kam e sakiraaɓe woɓɓe ɓeen. Caggal ɗuum, o yalti, o yehi nokku goɗɗo.
44012018	Nde weetunoo fu, fitina mawɗo ummii hakkunde sordaasiiɓe ɓeen. Iɓe ƴamundura noy Piyeer waɗi.
44012019	Hirudus yamiri ɓe piloo ɓe nannga mo, ammaa ɓe njiitaay mo. Ndelle o ƴami ndaarooɓe ɓeen ko laatii, de o yamiri ɓe mbaree. Caggal ɗuum, Hirudus jippii Yahuudiya, yehi Kaysariya jooɗowii toon.
44012020	Hirudus tikkani yimɓe Tirus e Sidon. De yimɓe ɓeen kaa muuyaay noon, sabo wo leydi makko ndiin ɓe keɓata nyaamdu. Ndelle ɓe ndawridi, ɓe nuli woɓɓe nyaagoo faa ɓe ndewra e makko. Ɓe paamiri e Bilastus dawranoowo gollooɓe kaananke.
44012021	Ɓe itti nyalaande faa ɓe kaalda e Hirudus kaananke oon. Nde nyannde ndeen yottinoo fu, o ɓornii kaddule kaananke, o jooɗii dow jooɗorgal laamu, o haaldi e maɓɓe.
44012022	Yimɓe ɓeen peekii, mbi'i: —Ɗum wo daande laamɗo, wanaa daande neɗɗo!
44012023	Wakkati oon fu, maleyka Joomiraaɗo fiyi Hirudus, sabo o hokkitaay Laamɗo teddeengal muuɗum. O ƴumi gilɗi, o maayi.
44012024	Ammaa konngol Laamɗo ngool ina yaara yeeso, ina ɓeyda sankitaade.
44012025	Nde Barnabas e Sool tilinoo e golle muɓɓen Urusaliima fu, ɓe njeccodii e Yuhanna bi'eteeɗo Marku.
44013001	Annabaaɓe e jannginooɓe ina ngoni ley kawrital goonɗinɓe gonngal Antiyoki ngaal. Kamɓe ngoni Barnabas e Simeyon noddirteeɗo Ɓaleejo e Lukiyus mo Sireene e Manahen, mawnidinɗo e Hirudus hooreejo leydi oon, kam e Sool.
44013002	Nyannde gomma iɓe teddina Joomiraaɗo tawi iɓe ngondi e suumayeere, ndeen Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i ɓe: —Cenndanee kam Barnabas e Sool saabe gollal ngal noddirmi ɓe ngaal.
44013003	Caggal suumayeere e du'aare maɓɓe, ɓe njowi juuɗe maɓɓe e dow yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen, ɓe nuli ɗum'en.
44013004	Nii Ruuhu Ceniiɗo nuliri ɓe. Ɓe njehi Selewkiya, ɓe naati laana maayo manngo ɓe ponndii ruunde Kipirus.
44013005	Nde ɓe njottinoo Salamis dow ruunde ndeen, ɓe mbaajii konngol Laamɗo ley cuuɗi Alhuudiyankooɓe baajorɗi. Yuhanna bi'eteeɗo Marku ina wondi e maɓɓe, ina walla ɓe.
44013006	Ɓe peƴƴiti ruunde ndeen faa ɓe njottii ngalluure wi'eteende Pafos. Toon ɓe tawi daggada Alhuudiyanke bi'eteeɗo Bar-Iisaa, biitotooɗo wo annabaajo.
44013007	Wo o howruujo kaananke bi'eteeɗo Sergiya Pool. Oon wo jom hakkillo. O noddi Barnabas e Sool sabo imo yiɗi nanude konngol Laamɗo.
44013008	Ammaa Elimas mo inndem fiirtata «daggada» oon salake ɓe. Imo filoo bonnitinde goonɗinal kaananke oon.
44013009	Ndeen Sool bi'eteeɗo Pool, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ndaari mo faa wooɗi,
44013010	wi'i: —Ɓii Ibiliisa! Aan keewɗo jamba e hiila, ganyo ko laaɓi fuu! A selataa oonyude laabi Joomiraaɗo ponnditiiɗi naa?
44013011	Joonin jukkungo Joomiraaɗo saaman e maaɗa, a wuman, a yi'ataa naange faa sarɗi oon yottoo. Wakkati oon ni, gite makko cuddini, ɗe niɓɓi. Imo memmemta, imo filoo ɗowoowo.
44013012	Nde kaananke oon yi'unoo ko waɗi ɗuum ndeen, goonɗini Iisaa. Waaju haala Joomiraaɗo kaan haaynake ɗum.
44013013	Pool e yaadiraaɓe muuɗum naati laana maayo manngo, ndilli Pafos, njottii Perge ley leydi Pamfiliya. Ɗoon Yuhanna bi'eteeɗo Marku seedi e maɓɓe, yeccii Urusaliima.
44013014	Ɓe ndilli Perge, ɓe ngari Antiyoki ley leydi Pisidiya. Ɓe naati waajordu nyalaande fowteteende, ɓe njooɗii.
44013015	Caggal janngeede Tawreeta Muusaa e dewte annabaaɓe, hooreeɓe waajordu nduun neli ɓe noddee ɓe ngara yeeso muɓɓen. Ɓe mbi'i: —Sakiraaɓe, si oɗon njogii haala cemmbinooha yimɓe ɗo fu, kaalee.
44013016	Pool ummii, hunci junngo muuɗum faa ɓe kakkilana ɗum, wi'i: —Israa'iilankooɓe e hulɓe Laamɗo woɓɓe, kettinee:
44013017	Laamɗo Israa'iilankooɓe oon suɓake maamiraaɓe meeɗen, teddinii lenyol maɓɓe nde ngol hoɗoynoo leydi Misira ndeen. O yaltiniri ɓe toon baawɗe makko.
44013018	O munyanii ɓe ley ladde faa waɗi duuɓi capanɗe nay.
44013019	Caggal ko o halki lenyi jeɗɗi e ley leydi Kanaana, o hokki ndi yimɓe makko ndona ndi.
44013020	Ko ɓe ngoni ley Misira faa warde ko ɓe naati leydi Kanaana fu waɗii hono duuɓi keme nay e capanɗe joy. Caggal ɗuum, o hokki ɓe sarotooɓe faa jamaanu annabi Samuwiila.
44013021	Nde ɗum faltinoo ndeen, ɓe nyaagii Laamɗo hokka ɓe kaananke. Laamɗo hokki ɓe Sawulu ɓii Kis ƴuuruɗo e lenyol Benyamin. Oon laamii ɓe duuɓi capanɗe nay.
44013022	Ndeen Laamɗo ɓorti Sawulu, hokki Daawda laamu. O haali kabaaru muuɗum, o wi'i: «Mi heɓii Daawda ɓii Yesa gorko belnoowo ɓernde am, gaɗoowo muuyɗe am fuu.»
44013023	E ƴuwdi makko Laamɗo wurtini Iisaa, kisinoowo Israa'iila no aadorinoo noon.
44013024	Fadde Iisaa warude, Yaayaa waajake yimɓe Israa'iila fuu tuuba, lootee lootagal batisima.
44013025	Katin, nde Yaayaa timminannoo golle muuɗum ndeen, wi'i ɓe: «Mi wanaa mo miiloton ngonumi oon. Ammaa ina woodi garoowo caggal am, mo mi fotaay fay e haɓɓitinde ɓoggi paɗe muuɗum.»
44013026	Sakiraaɓe, onon ƴuwdi Ibrahiima e hulɓe Laamɗo woɓɓe, wo enen nuldaa kabaaru kisinoowo o.
44013027	Sabo wonɓe Urusaliima ɓeen e hooreeɓe muɓɓen fuu annditaay Iisaa. Katin du ɓe paamaay haalaaji annabaaɓe janngeteeɗi nyalaande fowteteende fuu. Annabaaɓe ɓeen mbi'ii Iisaa sarete. Ko ɓe carii mo ɗuum, ɓe tabintinii haalaaji ɗiin.
44013028	Fay si taweede ɓe keɓaay daliili fuu no ɓe mbarda mo, ɓe nyaagake Pilaatu o waree.
44013029	Nde ɓe ngollunoo ko Binndi ɗiin mbi'i e makko ɗuum faa hiɓɓi ndeen, ɓe njippini mo e leggal palaangal, ɓe ngaɗi mo e saabeere.
44013030	Ammaa Laamɗo iirtinii mo.
44013031	Balɗe keewɗe o ɓangani wondunooɓe e makko ɓeen gilla Galili faa Urusaliima. Ɓeen ngoni seedantooɓe mo yeeso yimɓe joonin.
44013032	Minen, miɗen ngaddana on Kabaaru Lobbo: ko Laamɗo aadaninoo maamiraaɓe meeɗen ɗuum,
44013033	yottinanii en, enen taaniraaɓe muɓɓen. O waɗii ɗum e ley ko o iirtini Iisaa. Noon winndiraa ley jimol Jabuura suura ɗiɗi: «Wo a ɓiyam, hannden mi laatake Baaba maa.»
44013034	Katin du, Laamɗo iirtinii mo e hakkunde maayɓe, accaay ɓanndu makko nyoli. Noon haaldunoo nde wi'unoo: «Mi hokkan on barkeeji ceniiɗi ɗi mbonataa, ɗi podaninoomi Daawda ɗiin.»
44013035	Ɗum waɗi de o wi'i e Jabuura suura goɗɗo: «A accataa Ceniiɗo maa nyola.»
44013036	Daawda gollii ko Laamɗo muuyi golla e jamaanu muuɗum. Caggal ɗuum, o maayi. Ɓanndu makko hawrunduraa e maamiraaɓe makko, ndu nyoli.
44013037	Ammaa mo Laamɗo iirtini oon nyolaay.
44013038	Sakiraaɓe, anndee wo saabe makko de mbaajaɗon yaafeede hakkeeji.
44013039	Tawreeta Muusaa waawaa waɗude neɗɗo ponnditiiɗo. De kanko kaa, goonɗinɗo mo fuu, o ndaardan ɗum ponnditiiɗo.
44013040	Ɗum le, kaybee taa ko annabaaɓe cappinoo ɗuum hewtoo on:
44013041	«Onon jalnortooɓe golle am, ndaaree, de ɗum haaynoo on, de kalkon! Sabo mi waɗan goɗɗum e ley wakkati mooɗon, mo on ngoonɗintaa fay si neɗɗo haalannoo on.»
44013042	Caggal Pool e Barnabas njaltii waajordu nduun, jamaa oon nyaagii ɓe ɓe ngarta fowteteende waroore, faa ɓe njaha yeeso e waaju maɓɓe.
44013043	Caggal ko kawrital ngaal waɗi ɗuum, Alhuudiyankooɓe heewɓe e naatuɓe e diina muɓɓen njokki Pool e Barnabas. Ɓeen ɗiɗo fuu ina kaalda e maɓɓe, ina tindina ɓe ɓe keddoo e moƴƴere Laamɗo.
44013044	Fowteteende jokkunde ndeen, yimɓe ngalluure ndeen fuu kawriti faa kettinoo konngol Laamɗo.
44013045	Ammaa nde Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen njiinoo jamaa oon ndeen, kiram naati ɓe. Iɓe njedda ko Pool waajotoo ɗuum, iɓe njenna ɗum.
44013046	Ndeen Pool e Barnabas kaaldirani ɓe tannyoral, mbi'i: —Waajibi onon min artotoo haalande konngol Laamɗo ngol. Ammaa saabe on paɗɗii ngol, on ndaardaay ko'e mooɗon oɗon poti heɓude nguurndam nduumiiɗam, min njahan to yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe.
44013047	Sabo inan ko Joomiraaɗo yamiri min: «Mi darnii ma faa laatanoɗaa lenyi ɗiin annoora, faa kisinaa haddi adunaaru ndu fuu.»
44013048	Nde yimɓe lenyi goɗɗi ɗiin nannoo haalaaji ɗiin ndeen, ceyii, teddini konngol Joomiraaɗo ngool. Ɓe Laamɗo suɓanii nguurndam nduumiiɗam ɓeen fuu ngoonɗini.
44013049	Konngol Joomiraaɗo ngool sankitii e leydi ndiin fuu.
44013050	Ammaa Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen ummini hakkillooji rewɓe rewooɓe Laamɗo saahiiɓe, kam e mawɓe ngalluure ndeen. Ɓe ummini torra dow Pool e Barnabas, ɓe ndiiwi ɗum'en leydi maɓɓe.
44013051	Kam'en du piɗɗi colla koyɗe muɓɓen e maɓɓe, de njehi Ikoniya.
44013052	Taalibaaɓe ɓeen kebbinaa seyo e Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
44014001	Ley Ikoniya du Pool e Barnabas naati e ley waajordu Alhuudiyankooɓe. Ley ko ɓe mbaajii ɗuum, Alhuudiyankooɓe e yimɓe lenyi goɗɗi heewɓe ngoonɗini.
44014002	Ammaa Alhuudiyankooɓe saliiɓe goonɗinde ɓeen ummini hakkillooji lenyi goɗɗi, mbonni ɓerɗe muɓɓen faa mbanya sakiraaɓe goonɗinɓe ɓeen.
44014003	Ammaa ɗum fuu haɗaay ɓe ɓooyude toon, iɓe mbaajoroo haala Joomiraaɗo cuusal, iɓe kolla hinney Joomiraaɗo. Yimɓe ɓeen annditii ko ɓe mbaajotoo ɗuum wo goonga, sabo Laamɗo hokki ɓe baawɗe waɗude maandeeji kaayniiɗi e golleeji kaayniiɗi.
44014004	Yimɓe wuro ngoon peccii: woɓɓe keedani Alhuudiyankooɓe, woɓɓe du keedani nulaaɓe ɓeen.
44014005	Yimɓe lenyi goɗɗi e Alhuudiyankooɓe e ardiiɓe muɓɓen anniyii torrude ɓe e wardude ɓe kaaƴe.
44014006	Nde ɓe maatunoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe ndoggani Listara e Derbe e gure seraaji muɓɓen ley leydi Likoniya.
44014007	Toon du iɓe mbaajoo Kabaaru Lobbo oon.
44014008	Ley Listara ɗoon ina woodi gorko bonnguujo, dimdaaɗo e bonngaaku. Abada o yahaay e koyɗe makko.
44014009	Imo hettinii waaju Pool. Pool ndaari mo, yi'i o goonɗinii faa imo waawi danneede,
44014010	haali semmbe, wi'i: —Umma, dara e koyɗe maa! Gorko oon gurbitii, darii, ina yaha.
44014011	Nde yimɓe ɓeen njiinoo ko Pool waɗi ɗuum ndeen, mbulli, mbi'i e ley haala Likoniya'en: —Alla'en njippake dow meeɗen, na nanndinkinii e yimɓe!
44014012	Ɓe inndiri Barnabas «Jewus», ɓe inndiri Pool du «Hermes», sabo Pool wonnoo kaaloowo.
44014013	Suudu tooru maɓɓe wi'eteendu Jewus ina woni yaasin ngalluure toon. Almaami oon ƴuuri toon waddi ga'i maysiniraaɗi pinndi to dammbuɗe narruɗe ngalluure toon. Kanko e yimɓe ɓeen ina njiɗi waɗude ɗi kirsamaaji.
44014014	Ammaa nde Barnabas e Pool nannoo ɗum ndeen, ɗum metti ɗum'en faa ceeki kaddule muɓɓen, kenyanii jamaa oon ina peekoo,
44014015	ina mbi'a: —Worɓe, ɗume ngaɗoton ɗo? Minen du min yimɓe hono mooɗon. Miɗen mbaajoo Kabaaru Lobbo oon faa tuubon, celon golleeji ɓoli ɗi, ngarton e Laamɗo buurɗo, taguɗo kammu e leydi e maayo manngo e ko woni e muɓɓen fuu.
44014016	E jamaanuuji paltiiɗi ɗiin o accii lenyi fuu njokka laabi muɓɓen.
44014017	E ɗum fuu, imo golla ko wooɗi faa ɗum seedanoo mbooɗirka makko. Imo tomnana on ƴuwoonde, imo ɓenndinana on nyaamri e wakkati muuɗum. Imo waaltinira hakkillooji mon nyaamdu e seyo.
44014018	No Pool e Barnabas mbaajorii nii fu, faa hannden wo e semmbe kaɗiri jamaa oon hirsande ɗum'en ga'i ɗiin.
44014019	Caggal ɗuum, Alhuudiyankooɓe ƴuuri Antiyoki e Ikoniya. Ɓe keɓi hakkillooji yimɓe ɓeen faa limni Pool kaaƴe. Ɓe ndaasi ɗum, ɓe njoppowi ɗum faa caggal wuro ngoon, sabo ɓe miilii wo maayɗo.
44014020	Ammaa nde taalibaaɓe ɓeen ngarnoo piilii mo ndeen, o ummii, o soƴƴitii ley wuro ngoon. Jaango majjum, o yaadi e Barnabas wuro wi'eteengo Derbe.
44014021	Nde ɓe mbaajinoo toon Kabaaru Lobbo fu, yimɓe heewɓe laatii taalibaaɓe Iisaa. Caggal ɗuum, ɓe njeccii Listara e Ikoniya, kam e Antiyoki.
44014022	Iɓe ɓeydana taalibaaɓe semmbe, iɓe tindina ɗum'en keddoo e goonɗinal, iɓe mbi'a: —Sanaa tampen tampiriiji keewɗi fadde men e naatude laamu Laamɗo.
44014023	E ley kawrite goonɗinɓe ɗeen fuu, ɓe cuɓanii ɗum'en mawɓe. Caggal ɗuum, ɓe cuumii, ɓe ndu'ii, ɓe kalfini ɗum'en Joomiraaɗo mo ɓe ngoonɗini oon.
44014024	Nde ɓe ceekunoo leydi Pisidiya ndeen, ɓe ngari leydi Pamfiliya.
44014025	Ɓe mbaajii konngol ngol ley wuro Perge. Caggal ɗuum, ɓe njippowii Ataliya.
44014026	Toon ɓe naati laana maayo manngo, ɓe pornyii Antiyoki ɗo ɓe kalfinanoo moƴƴere Laamɗo faa ɓe ngolla gollal ngal ɓe tilii ngaal.
44014027	Nde ɓe njottinoo ndeen, ɓe kawrunduri yimɓe kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal, ɓe kaalani ngal no Laamɗo nawtorii ɓe, no o omtirani yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe dammbugal goonɗinal.
44014028	Ɓe keddii ɗoon faa ɓooyti, iɓe ngondi e taalibaaɓe ɓeen.
44015001	Yimɓe woɓɓe ƴuuri Yahuudiya ngari Antiyoki, ina njanngina sakiraaɓe ɓeen, ina mbi'a: —Si on taadiraaka hono no Muusaa wi'iri noon fu, on kisataa.
44015002	Pool e Barnabas pooɗunduri e maɓɓe, ndukidi e maɓɓe faa tiiɗi. Ndelle ɓe tabintini nelde Pool e Barnabas e yimɓe woɓɓe faa Urusaliima, ɓe kaaldowa e nulaaɓe e mawɓe goonɗinɓe ɓeen dow majjum.
44015003	Ndelle kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal neli ɓe. Ɓe peƴƴiti leyɗe Finisi e Samariya, iɓe kaalana goonɗinɓe toon haala tuubugol yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe. Ɗum laatanii sakiraaɓe ɓeen fuu seyo manngo.
44015004	Nde ɓe njottinoo Urusaliima ndeen, kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal e nulaaɓe e mawɓe ɓeen njaɓɓii ɓe. Ɓe kaalani ɗum'en ko Laamɗo gollitiri ɓe.
44015005	Ammaa woɓɓe ley goonɗinɓe jeyaaɓe e fedde Farisa'en ummii, mbi'i: —Waajibi ɓe taadee, ɓe njamiree jokkude Tawreeta Muusaa.
44015006	Nulaaɓe e mawɓe ɓeen kawriti faa ndaara haala kaan.
44015007	Caggal ko haalaaji ɗiin keewii, Piyeer ummii, wi'i ɓe: —Sakiraaɓe, oɗon anndi Laamɗo suɓake kam e ley mooɗon gilla ko ɓooyi. O suɓake kam faa mi waajoo Kabaaru Lobbo oon hakkunde yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe, faa ɓe nana, ɓe ngoonɗina.
44015008	Laamɗo annduɗo ɓerɗe oon hollii jaɓanii ɓe, nde hokkunoo ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hono no meeɗen ni.
44015009	Walaa fuu ko o senndiri en e maɓɓe, e ley ko o laaɓiniri ɓerɗe maɓɓe e goonɗinal.
44015010	Joonin, ko waɗi de oɗon ndaartindoo Laamɗo? Oɗon njowa e taalibaaɓe ɓeen donngal ngal enen e maamiraaɓe meeɗen fuu en mbaawaay ronndaade.
44015011	A'aa. Wo moƴƴere Joomiraaɗo meeɗen Iisaa de tannyorɗen hisineede. Hono noon kamɓe du.
44015012	Kawrital ngaal fuu deƴƴinii siw, ina hettinii ko Barnabas e Pool pillotoo no Laamɗo hokkiri ɗum'en waɗude maandeeji kaayniiɗi e kaayeefiiji hakkunde lenyi goɗɗi.
44015013	Nde ɓe kettinnoo haalaaji ɗiin faa wooɗi fu, Yaakuuba ɓeydi haala, wi'i: —Sakiraaɓe, kettinanee kam!
44015014	Simon humpitii en no Laamɗo artorii hakkilande yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe, faa waɗa ɗum'en yimɓe muuɗum.
44015015	Ɗum hawrii e haalaaji annabaaɓe ɗiin, hono no winndiraa ni:
44015016	«Joomiraaɗo wi'i: Caggal ɗuum, mi wartan, mi nyiɓtoo suudu Daawda saamundu nduun, mi fonndita ko boni e mayru, mi darna ndu katin,
44015017	faa yimɓe heddiiɓe fuu tewta Joomiraaɗo, lenyi ɗi noddammi fuu, faa laatoo yimɓe am.
44015018	Joomiraaɗo tabintinɗo kulle ɗe anndunoo waɗan gilla arande, kam wi'i noon.»
44015019	Ɗum saabii miin kaa ko nji'umi, taa tiiɗinanen lenyi goɗɗi tuubuɗi ngarti e Laamɗo ɗiin.
44015020	Ammaa mbinndanen ɓe ɓe ndeentoo e ko tooruuji tuunini e jeenu e nyaamude ko saaɗi e nyaamude ƴiiƴam.
44015021	Gilla e jamaanuuji ɓooyɗi, Tawreeta Muusaa ina jannginee ley gure ɗeen fuu, iɓe njannga ɗum nyalaande fowteteende fuu ley cuuɗi baajorɗi.
44015022	Ndeen nulaaɓe ɓeen e mawɓe e kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal fuu paamiri faa cuɓoo worɓe e ley muɓɓen faa nela ɗum'en Antiyoki, ɓe njaada e Pool e Barnabas. Ɓe cuɓii Yahuuda bi'eteeɗo Barasaba, kam e Silas. Ɗiɗo ɓeen fuu wo ardiiɓe ley sakiraaɓe goonɗinɓe.
44015023	Inan ɓataaki ki ɓe kokki ɗum'en: Minen sakiraaɓe mooɗon nulaaɓe e mawɓe, miɗen njowta on, onon sakiraaɓe amin lenyi goɗɗi gonɗi Antiyoki e Siiriya e Silisi.
44015024	Min nanii yimɓe ƴuuruɓe to amin mettinirii ɓerɗe mooɗon haalaaji, njiiɓii hakkillooji mooɗon. Minen le, min njamiraay ɓe.
44015025	Min ndawridii, min paamiri min cuɓoo worɓe faa min nela ɗum'en to mooɗon, ɓe njaada e yigiraaɓe amin horsuɓe Barnabas e Pool,
44015026	farritinɓe yonkiiji muɓɓen saabe Joommen Iisaa Almasiihu.
44015027	Ɗum waɗi de min neli Yahuuda e Silas, paamina on ko min mbinndi e mooɗon ɗuum hunnduko e hunnduko.
44015028	Minen e Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, min anniyake taa min njowa on doŋle tedduɗe si wanaa ko tilsi ɗuum:
44015029	ndeentoɗon e kirsanaaɗi tooruuji e ƴiiƴam e ko saaɗi e jeenu. Si on ndeenii ko'e mooɗon e kujje ɗe, on ngaɗii ko wooɗi. Laamɗo reena en!
44015030	Wooɗi, ɓe kokkaa laawol, ɓe njehi Antiyoki. Nde ɓe njottinoo ndeen, ɓe kawrunduri kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal, ɓe kokki ngal ɓataaki kiin.
44015031	Nde ɓeen janngunoo ki ndeen, ceyii sabo haalaaji ɗiin cemmbinii ɓerɗe muɓɓen.
44015032	Yahuuda e Silas wo annabaaɓe. Ɓe mbaaltiniri ɓerɗe sakiraaɓe e haalaaji keewɗi, ɓe cemmbini ɗum'en.
44015033	Nde ɓe ɓooytunoo toon seeɗa fu, ɓe ceedi e sakiraaɓe ɓeen e dow jam, ɓe njeccii to nelnooɓe ɓe toon. [
44015034	De Silas, kam kaa, heddii toon.]
44015035	Pool e Barnabas keddii ley Antiyoki ɗoon. Kam'en e woɓɓe heewɓe ina njanngina ina mbaajoo konngol Joomiraaɗo.
44015036	Caggal balɗe seeɗa, Pool wi'i Barnabas: —Njeccoɗen e gure ɗe mbaajinoɗen konngol Joomiraaɗo ɗeen fuu, njippanoɗen sakiraaɓe meeɗen ɓeen, ndaaren no ɓe ngorri.
44015037	Barnabas ina yiɗi ɓe njaada e Yuhanna bi'eteeɗo Marku.
44015038	De Pool kaa muuyaay ɓe njaada e gorko oon, sabo oon seediino e maɓɓe Pamfiliya, yaadaay e maɓɓe faa gollida e maɓɓe.
44015039	Barnabas e Pool luuri faa ceedi. Mono e maɓɓe fuu suɓii neɗɗo goɗɗo. Barnabas yaadi e Marku, naati laana maayo, fonndii ruunde Kipirus.
44015040	Pool du suɓii yaadude e Silas. Sakiraaɓe ɓeen kalfinii ɓe e hinney Joomiraaɗo de ɓe ndilli.
44015041	Ɓe ndewi leyɗe Siiriya e Silisi, iɓe cemmbina kawrite goonɗinɓe ɗeen.
44016001	Pool wari Derbe. Caggal ɗuum, o yottii Listara. Goonɗinɗo bi'eteeɗo Timote ina tawaa ɗoon. Inniiko wo Alhuudiyanke goonɗinɗo, de baabiiko wo neɗɗo ƴuuruɗo Geres.
44016002	Sakiraaɓe wonɓe Listara e Ikoniya ɓeen ina ceedanoo mo wo o lobbo.
44016003	Pool ina yiɗi faa o yaada e muɓɓen. Ndelle yaari mo faa o taadee tafon, sabo Alhuudiyankooɓe wonɓe e leyɗe ɗeen ɓeen fuu ina anndi baabiiko wo ƴuuruɗo Geres.
44016004	Ley gure ɗe ɓe peƴƴiti ɗeen, iɓe njottinana goonɗinɓe jamirooje ɗe nulaaɓe e mawɓe wonɓe Urusaliima ɓeen kolli ɓe njokka.
44016005	Hono noon, kawrite goonɗinɓe ɗeen ina ɓeydoo semmbe ley goonɗinal, ina ɓeydoo heewude nyannde fuu.
44016006	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haɗi ɓe waajaade konngol ngol ley Aasiya. Saabe majjum ɓe ndewi leydi Firigiya e leydi Galaatiya.
44016007	Nde ɓe ngarnoo keerol Misiya ndeen, ɓe pilii yaade Bitiniya, ammaa Ruuhu Iisaa accaay ɓe naata.
44016008	Saabe ɗuum, ɓe paltii Misiya, ɓe naati e wuro wi'eteengo Torowas.
44016009	Jemma oon, Pool heɓi holleede. O yi'i gorko Makedoniyanke ina darii, ina nyaagoo mo ina wi'a: —Ngaraa Makedoniya, mballaa min!
44016010	Nde Pool yiinoo ko hollaa ɗum ndeen, wakkati oon ni, filii yahude Makedoniya. Min tannyorii Laamɗo noddii min faa min mbaajoo ɓe Kabaaru Lobbo.
44016011	Hono noon, min naati laana maayo ƴuuruka Torowas, min ponndii ruunde Samotaras. Jaango majjum, min ponndii Neyapolis.
44016012	Min ƴuwi ɗoon, min ponndii Filipi. Filipi wo ngalluure mawnde e leydi Makedoniya nde Romankooɓe ndawranta. Min ngaɗi balɗe seeɗa ɗoon.
44016013	Nyalaande fowteteende, min njaltiri wuro ngoon hedde daande maayo to min miili Alhuudiyankooɓe na mboownoo waɗude du'aare. Min tawi ɗoon rewɓe ina kawriti. Min njooɗii, min mbaajii ɓe.
44016014	Gooto maɓɓe wo debbo jokkuɗo Laamɗo bi'eteeɗo Lidiya. Wo o connoowo kaddule boɗeeje, jeyaaɗo ngalluure wi'eteende Tiyatira. Imo hettindii waaju oon, de Joomiraaɗo omti ɓernde makko faa o jaɓa ko Pool waajotoo ɗuum.
44016015	Kanko e koreeji makko fuu ɓe lootaa lootagal batisima. Caggal ɗuum, o nyaagii min, o wi'i: —Si oɗon tiigorii kam mi goonɗinɗo Joomiraaɗo fu, ngaree suudu am, mbeeranon kam. O tilsinani min faa min njaɓi.
44016016	Nyannde wootere miɗen njaha to nokkuure waɗirde du'aare. Korɗo gonduɗo e ginnaaru hawriti e amin. Wo o ji'oowo ko warata. Joomiraaɓe makko keɓii kaalisi keewɗo e ndaggadaaku makko nguun.
44016017	O jokki min, minen e Pool, imo feekoo, imo wi'a: —Yimɓe ɓe wo gollanooɓe Laamɗo Toowɗo! Iɓe mbaajoo on laawol kisindam!
44016018	Balɗe keewɗe imo waɗa noon faa ɓernde Pool ummii, hucciti e makko, wi'i ginnaaru nduun: —Saabe Iisaa Almasiihu, yaltu e debbo o! Ginnaaru nduun yalti wakkati oon pay.
44016019	Nde joomiraaɓe korɗo oon paamunoo laawol muɓɓen hemrude ceede e makko timmii fu, nanngi Pool e Silas, ndaasi ɗum'en ngaddi faa ley luumo yeeso sarotooɓe wuro ngoon.
44016020	Ndeen ɓe njaari ɗum'en to hooreeɓe, ɓe mbi'i: —Worɓe ɗiɗo ɓe wo Alhuudiyankooɓe. Iɓe ngadda baasi e wuro meeɗen ngo.
44016021	Iɓe mbaajoo al'aadaaji ɗi ndaganaaki en njaɓen naa ngollen, sabo en Romankooɓe.
44016022	Jamaa oon ummanii ɓe. Hooreeɓe ɓeen njamiri ɓe ɓortee kaddule maɓɓe, de ɓe piiree loosi.
44016023	Ɓe piyaa faa naawi, ɓe paɗɗaa ley kasu. Hooreeɓe ɓeen njamiri kayboowo kasu oon hayba ɓe faa wooɗa.
44016024	Oon le, nde heɓunoo yamiroore ndeen fu, nanni ɓe e ley suudu kasu hakkundeeru. O geƴƴiri koyɗe maɓɓe geƴƴelle leɗɗe.
44016025	Hakkunde jemma oon, Pool e Silas ina ngaɗa du'aare, ina njimana Laamɗo. Kasunkooɓe woɓɓe ɓeen du ina kettindanii ɓe.
44016026	De wakkati gooto, leydi dimmbii dimmbagol manngol faa joƴƴinirɗe kasu ɗeen njergii. Wakkati oon du, dammbuɗe ɗeen fuu omtii, geƴƴelle kasunkooɓe ɗeen fuu kaɓɓitii.
44016027	Nde kayboowo oon finnoo de yi'i dammbuɗe kasu ɗeen ina omtii fu, soorti kaafaahi muuɗum faa waritoo, miilii kasunkooɓe ɓeen ndoggii.
44016028	Pool ƴeewnii faa toowi, wi'i mo: —Taa waɗu hoore maa ko boni, min fuu ɗo min ngoni!
44016029	Ndeen kayboowo oon ŋaarii jaynorgol. O doggiri kasu to Pool e Silas ngoni toon, o hippii yeeso muɓɓen, heddii imo diwna.
44016030	Caggal ɗuum, o wurtini ɓe, o wi'i ɓe: —Joomiraaɓe, noy kaanumi waɗude faa mi hisa?
44016031	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Goonɗin Iisaa Joomiraaɗo, ndeen a hisan, aan e koreeji maa fuu.
44016032	Ɓe mbaajii mo konngol Joomiraaɗo, kanko e koreeji makko fuu.
44016033	Faa ɓooyti seeɗa, ley jemma oon o yaari ɓe, o lootowi barme maɓɓe. Wakkati oon du o lootaa lootagal batisima, kanko e koreeji makko fuu.
44016034	O nanni Pool e Silas suudu makko, o hokki ɗum'en nyaamdu. Kanko e koreeji makko fuu ɓe ceyii sabo ɓe keɓii goonɗinde Laamɗo.
44016035	Nde weetunoo ndeen, hooreeɓe Romankooɓe neli yimɓe laamu mbi'a kayboowo oon yoppa worɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen.
44016036	Kayboowo oon haalanowi ɗum Pool, wi'i: —Hooreeɓe ɓeen nulii njoppeɗon. Mburtee joonin, njehee e jam.
44016037	Ammaa Pool jaabii, wi'i: —Ɓe njamirii min piyee yeeso yimɓe tawa min caraaka, fay si min ɗiɗo fuu min Romankooɓe. Ɓe nanni min e kasu. Joonin ɓe njaltiniran min cuncukka naa? Ɗum kaa laatataako. Sanaa kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ngara ɓe njaltina min!
44016038	Yimɓe laamu ɓeen kaaltani hooreeɓe Romankooɓe ɓeen haala kaan. Ɓeen kuli nde nannoo Pool e Silas wo Romankooɓe ndeen.
44016039	Ɓe njehi, ɓe curowi ɗum'en, ɓe mburtini ɗum'en kasu toon. Ɓe nyaagii ɗum'en ndilla wuro ngoon.
44016040	Nde Pool e Silas njaltunoo e kasu ndeen, naati galle Lidiya. Ɓe nji'i sakiraaɓe ɓeen, ɓe cemmbini ɓerɗe muɓɓen. Caggal ɗuum, ɓe ndilli.
44017001	Pool e Silas peƴƴiti Amfipolis e Apoloni faa njottii Tesaloniiki. Ina woodi waajordu Alhuudiyankooɓe toon du.
44017002	Pool waɗi no woowri, naati ley waajordu nduun. Nyalaaɗe powteteeɗe tati imo liddundura e maɓɓe imo fiirtana ɓe Binndi ɗiin.
44017003	O fiirtani ɓe, o holli ɓe ina tilsunoo Almasiihu oon torree, ummintinee e maayde. O wi'i ɓe: —Iisaa mo mbaajotoomi on haala muuɗum oon, kam woni Almasiihu.
44017004	Woɓɓe maɓɓe tannyori ɗum goonga, njokki mo, kanko Pool, e Silas. Yimɓe Geresankooɓe rewooɓe Laamɗo heewɓe e rewɓe saahiiɓe ɗuuɗuɓe du njokki ɓe.
44017005	Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓe nganaa goonɗinɓe ɓeen kiri Pool e Silas, nanngi yimɓe huyfuɓe yiilotooɓe ley luumo, kawrunduri ɗum'en. Ɓe njirkiti ngalluure ndeen fuu. Ɓe naati e galle Yason, iɓe piloo Pool e Silas faa ɓe njaara ɗum'en yeeso yimɓe wuro.
44017006	Nde ɓe kunnginoo yiitude ɗum'en ndeen, ɓe ndaasi Yason e sakiraaɓe woɓɓe, ɓe ngaddi ɗum'en to sarotooɓe ngalluure ndeen, iɓe peekoo, iɓe mbi'a: —Yimɓe umminooɓe baasi e aduna o fuu ngarii ɗo.
44017007	Yason weerni ɗum'en! Ɓe fuu ko ɓe ngaɗata ɗuum ina luttunduri e sariya kaananke Roma mawɗo oon. Iɓe mbi'a kaananke goɗɗo ina woodi, bi'eteeɗo Iisaa.
44017008	Haalaaji ɗiin njirkiti jamaa oon e sarotooɓe ngalluure ndeen.
44017009	Sarotooɓe ɓeen njomnii Yason e wonduɓe e muuɗum ɓeen, njaɓi buuɗi ɗiin, de njoofi ɗum'en.
44017010	Jemma oon pay, sakiraaɓe ɓeen neli Pool e Silas Bereya. Nde ɓe njottinoo ndeen, ɓe njehi to waajordu Alhuudiyankooɓe.
44017011	Yimɓe wonɓe ɗoon ina ɓuri Alhuudiyankooɓe wonɓe Tesaloniiki ɓeen jikku lobbo. Ɓe njakkitorii konngol Pool ngool e juuɗe ɗiɗi. Iɓe piloo ley Binndi ɗiin nyannde fuu faa ɓe ndaara yalla ko Pool waajii ɗuum wo goonga.
44017012	Heewɓe e maɓɓe ngoonɗini, kam e rewɓe Geresankooɓe saahiiɓe e worɓe Geresankooɓe heewɓe.
44017013	Nde Alhuudiyankooɓe Tesaloniiki paamunoo Pool waajake konngol Laamɗo ley Bereya ndeen, ɓe ngari toon, ɓe njirkiti jamaa oon, ɓe ummini hakkillooji muɓɓen.
44017014	Wakkati oon fu, sakiraaɓe ɓeen neli Pool to maayo manngo faa hooƴa laana, de Silas e Timote keddii ɗoon.
44017015	Ɗowtuɓe Pool ɓeen njaadi e muuɗum faa Ateena. Pool yeccini ɓe Bereya faa ɓe kaalana Silas e Timote ngara to muuɗum law.
44017016	Pool ina doomi ɓe Ateena fadde maɓɓe warude. Ɓernde muuɗum naawi sanne ko yi'i no ngalluure ndeen foti heewde tooruuji noon.
44017017	Ɗum waɗi de o haaldi e Alhuudiyankooɓe e rewooɓe Laamɗo wonɓe ley waajordu nduun. Nyannde fuu imo haalda e yimɓe wuro ngoon taliyaare to ɓe kawritata toon.
44017018	Woɓɓe ley filotooɓe paamal wi'eteeɓe Epikuri'en e Sitoyko'en njaabunduri e makko. Woɓɓe ina mbi'a: —Ɗume borbortoowo o haalata? Woɓɓe du ina mbi'a: —Imo nanndi e baajotooɗo haala tooruuji janani. Walaa ko ɓe mbiiri noon si wanaa haala Iisaa e ummital maayɓe o waajinoo ɓe.
44017019	Ndeen ɓe kooƴi Pool, ɓe njaari ɗum waamnde to kawrital Areyopagus waɗata. Ɓe mbi'i ɗum: —Miɗen njiɗi anndude diina keso mo mbaajotoɗaa oon.
44017020	Si goonga, aɗa toɓɓa e noppi amin haalaaji ɗi min mboowaa nanude. Miɗen njiɗi anndude maanaa majji.
44017021	Tawi Ateenankooɓe e jananɓe jooɗiiɓe toon ɓeen ngollataa huunde fuu si wanaa hettindaade huunde heyre naa fillitaade nde.
44017022	Ndeen Pool darii hakkunde kawrital Areyopagus, wi'i: —Ateenankooɓe, mi yi'ii on yiɗuɓe diina mooɗon sanne.
44017023	Sabo ko njiiltiimi e ngalluure mooɗon ɗuum, mi yi'ii cuuɗi mooɗon dewirɗi, mi tawii ina winndaa e ittirde sadaka wootere: «Saabe Alla mo anndaaka». Ndelle, Alla mo on anndaa oon, kam mbaajotoomi on.
44017024	Laamɗo taguɗo adunaaru e ko woni e muuɗum fuu oon, kam woni jom kammu e leydi. O jooɗataako ley cuuɗi nyiɓiraaɗi juuɗe.
44017025	O haajaaka yimɓe ngollana mo fay huunde, sabo kanko hokkata tageefo ngoon fuu nguurndam e foofaango e huunde fuu.
44017026	E neɗɗo gooto Laamɗo wurtiniri lenyi ɗiin fuu, joƴƴini ɗum'en e adunaaru ndu. Gilla ɗum waɗaay, o darnii wakkatiiji e keeri koɗorɗe muɓɓen.
44017027	Laamɗo waɗii ɗum faa ɓe piloo ɗum, ɓe memmemta faa ɓe njiita ɗum. E ɗum fuu o woɗɗaaki fay gooto e meeɗen.
44017028	Kam waɗi de eɗen mbuura, eɗen njaha, eɗen ngoni ɗo. Hono noon du yimooɓe mooɗon woɓɓe mbi'i: «Enen du, en ƴuwdi makko.»
44017029	Sabo en ƴuwdi makko, en kaanaa miilaade imo nanndi e tooru moƴƴiniraandu kaŋŋe naa cardi naa hayre sehaande, nde neɗɗo moƴƴinirta nyeenyal e hakkillo.
44017030	Laamɗo rewtidaaki yimɓe nde ngonnoo ley majjere ndeen. Joonin, o yamirii yimɓe fuu tuuba ɗo tawaa fuu.
44017031	Sabo o waɗii nyannde nde o sarotoo adunaaru ndu e fonnditaare. O sarortoo ɗum e neɗɗo mo o suɓii oon. O hollii yimɓe fuu ɗum wo goonga nde o ummintinnoo neɗɗo oon e maayde.
44017032	Nde ɓe nannoo Pool ina waajoo haala ummital maayɓe ndeen, woɓɓe na njalnoroo mo, de woɓɓe na mbi'a: —Min kettindoto waaju maa o nyannde wonnde.
44017033	Nii Pool wurtorii ley maɓɓe.
44017034	Woɓɓe njokki mo, ngoonɗini. Gooto maɓɓe ina wi'ee Diyonisiyus, jeyaaɗo e kawrital Areyopagus. Kam e debbo bi'eteeɗo Damaris, e woɓɓe katin du ngoonɗini.
44018001	Caggal ɗuum, Pool dilli Ateena, yehi Korintu.
44018002	O tawi toon Alhuudiyanke bi'eteeɗo Akila, jeyaaɗo leydi mbi'eteendi Ponta. Ɓooyaay ko oon e deekum bi'eteeɗo Pirisilla ƴuuri Itali, sabo Kalawdiyus kaananke mawɗo oon yamiriino Alhuudiyankooɓe fuu mburtoo Roma. Pool yehi ndaarude ɓe.
44018003	O wondi e maɓɓe ɗoon, imo gollida e maɓɓe sabo wo o gaɗoowo hukumuuji hono no maɓɓe ni.
44018004	Nyalaande fowteteende fuu, Pool ina liddundura e Alhuudiyankooɓe e Geresankooɓe ley waajordu. Imo filoo faa ɓe ngoonɗina.
44018005	Nde Silas e Timote ƴuurnoo Makedoniya njottii Korintu ndeen, Pool watti hakkillo muuɗum fuu e waajaade, ina seedanoo Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen Iisaa woni Almasiihu.
44018006	Ammaa saabe ko ɓe calanii mo, iɓe njenna mo, o fiɗɗi kaddule makko, o wi'i ɓe: —Si Laamɗo jukkake on fu, wo feloore mooɗon! Miin kaa, mi walaa feloore. Gilla joonin mi yahan to ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe.
44018007	O dilli ɗoon, o yehi to gorko jokkuɗo Laamɗo, bi'eteeɗo Tiitu Yustus, mo galle muuɗum takkii e waajordu nduun.
44018008	Kirispus, hooreejo waajordu nduun oon, kam e koreeji muuɗum fuu ngoonɗini Joomiraaɗo. Heewɓe e Korintunkooɓe hettindiiɓe ɓeen ngoonɗini, de lootaa lootagal batisima.
44018009	Jemma gooto Joomiraaɗo haaldi e Pool ley holleede, wi'i: —Taa hulu, taa deƴƴina. Waaja,
44018010	sabo miɗo wondi e maaɗa. Fay gooto waawaa torrude ma. Miɗo woodi yimɓe heewɓe ley ngalluure nde.
44018011	Pool jooɗii hakkunde maɓɓe hitaande e lebbi jeegom, ina janngina ɓe konngol Laamɗo.
44018012	Nde Galliyo laaminoo leydi Akaya ndeen, Alhuudiyankooɓe paamiri, ummanii Pool, njaari ɗum suudu sariya,
44018013	peli ɗum, mbi'i: —Gorko o na nannga hakkillooji yimɓe faa ndewra Laamɗo e laawol ngol wanaa Tawreeta Muusaa.
44018014	Pool anniyii faa jaaboo ɓe, de Galliyo wi'i Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen: —Alhuudiyankooɓe, si tawii wo toonya naa gollal bonngal o waɗi on, mi jaɓanan on ko mbullitiɗon dow makko ɗuum.
44018015	Ammaa wo ɗum jeddi dow haalaaji diina mooɗon e inɗe tan. Wo jeddi dow sariya mooɗon onon. Ndelle sanaa caroɗon onon e ko'e mooɗon. Miin kaa, mi sarataako kulle ɗeen!
44018016	Caggal ɗuum, o wurtini ɓe suudu sariya nduun.
44018017	Joonin le, ɓe fuu ɓe nanngi Sosteni, hooreejo waajordu nduun, ɓe piyi ɗum yeeso suudu sariya ɗoon. Ammaa e ɗum fuu Galliyo hillaaka fey.
44018018	Pool ɓooyti ɗoon balɗe keewɗe. Caggal ɗuum, o waynunduri e sakiraaɓe ɓeen, o naati laana, o fonndii Siiriya, kanko e Pirisilla e Akila. Fadde makko naatude laana kaan, o laɓi hoore makko nokku bi'eteeɗo Kankiriya saabe ko o hunii Laamɗo.
44018019	Ɓe njottii Efeesu. Pool yoppi ɗoon Pirisilla e Akila. Kam kaa naati waajordu ina liddundura e Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen.
44018020	Ɓe nyaagii mo o wonda e maɓɓe, de o jaɓaay.
44018021	Nde o waynundurannoo e maɓɓe ndeen, o wi'i: —Mi wartowan to mooɗon si Laamɗo jaɓii. O naati laana, o dilli Efeesu.
44018022	O yehi faa o yottii Kaysariya, de o ƴeenti Urusaliima faa o jowta kawrital goonɗinɓe ngaal. Caggal ɗuum, o yehi Antiyoki.
44018023	Pool ɓooyti toon seeɗa de dilli. O feƴƴiti leydi Galaatiya e leydi Firigiya, imo yaha imo semmbina ɓerɗe taalibaaɓe toon fuu.
44018024	Alhuudiyanke bi'eteeɗo Apolos, dimaaɗo Alesandiri, wari Efeesu. Wo o baawɗo haala, annduɗo Binndi ɗiin,
44018025	jannguɗo laawol Joomiraaɗo. Imo teeŋi e waaju sanne, imo janngina kabaaru Iisaa faa laaɓa. De wo lootagal batisima ngal Yaayaa waɗunoo ngaal tan o anndi.
44018026	Imo waajoroo tannyoral e ley waajordu nduun. Nde Pirisilla e Akila kettindaninoo mo fu, njaari mo, piirtani mo laawol Laamɗo ngool, ɓeydani mo ko o anndaano.
44018027	Nde Apolos anniyinoo yaade leydi Akaya ndeen, sakiraaɓe ɓeen mballi mo. Ɓe mbinndani taalibaaɓe wonɓe toon ɓeen ɓataaki njaɓɓoo mo faa wooɗa. Nde o yottinoo toon ndeen, o walli goonɗinɓe ɓeen e dow moƴƴere Laamɗo sanne.
44018028	Sabo imo yedda Alhuudiyankooɓe imo liɓa haala muɓɓen hakkunde yimɓe, imo hollira ɗum'en ley Binndi Ceniiɗi wo Iisaa woni Almasiihu.
44019001	Nde Apolos wonnoo Korintu ndeen, Pool jokki laawol ley baamle, yehi Efeesu. O tawi toon taalibaaɓe.
44019002	O ƴami ɗum'en, o wi'i: —Nde ngoonɗinnoɗon ndeen yalla on keɓii Ruuhu Ceniiɗo naa? Ɓe njaabii mo: —Min nanaay yalla Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ina woodi du, sakko min keɓa.
44019003	O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Ndelle, lootagal batisima ngale keɓuɗon? Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Lootagal batisima Yaayaa ngaal.
44019004	Pool wi'i: —Yaayaa lootirii yimɓe batisima tuubugol hakke, ina wi'a yimɓe ɓeen ngoonɗina garoowo caggal muuɗum oon, ɗum woni Iisaa.
44019005	Nde ɓe nannoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe lootaa lootagal batisima dow innde Iisaa Joomiraaɗo.
44019006	Nde Pool yownoo juuɗe muuɗum dow maɓɓe fu, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii e maɓɓe, iɓe kaalda ɗemle janane, iɓe kaalda annabaaku.
44019007	Iɓe ngaɗa hono yimɓe sappo e ɗiɗo.
44019008	Pool naati e ley waajordu nduun, ina waajoroo ɓe tannyoral haddi lebbi tati. Imo haalda e maɓɓe, imo liddundura e maɓɓe, imo filoo faaminde ɓe haala laamu Laamɗo.
44019009	Ammaa yoorɓe ɓerɗe na ngoni ley maɓɓe, njaɓaay goonɗinde, ina mbonna laawol Joomiraaɗo ngool yeeso yimɓe fuu. Ɗum waɗi de Pool seedi e maɓɓe, yaari taalibaaɓe ɓeen feere, ina waajoo ɗum'en nyannde fuu e ley janngirde neɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Tiranus.
44019010	O golliri noon faa hiɓɓi duuɓi ɗiɗi, faa jooɗiiɓe e leydi Aasiya ɓeen fuu nani konngol Joomiraaɗo ngool, gilla e Alhuudiyankooɓe faa e Geresankooɓe.
44019011	Laamɗo hokki Pool waɗude kaayeefiiji mawɗi.
44019012	Fay tekke e kaddule meemuɗe ɓanndu makko ina njaaree, njowee e dow nyawɓe. Nyawɓe ɓeen ndaɗa e nyawuuji muɓɓen, ginnaaji na mburtoo e muɓɓen.
44019013	Woɓɓe ley Alhuudiyankooɓe na njiiloo faa ndiiwa ginnaaji. Ɓe pilii riiwrude ɗum'en e innde Iisaa, ɓe mbi'i: —E Innde Iisaa mo Pool waajotoo haala muuɗum oon, njaltee!
44019014	Gooto e hooreeɓe almaami'en, Alhuudiyanke bi'eteeɗo Sikewa, ɓiɓɓe muuɗum worɓe njeɗɗo ngaɗii noon,
44019015	faa ginnaaru jaabii ɗum'en, wi'i: —Miɗo anndi Iisaa, Pool du miɗo anndi haala muuɗum. De onon kaa, wo on ɓeye?
44019016	Neɗɗo gonduɗo e ginnaaru oon hipporii ɓe semmbe faa jaalii ɓe, torri ɓe faa ɓe ndoggi. Ɓe njalti suudu nduun ɓalli ɓoli barmuɗi.
44019017	Kabaaru majjum sankitii hakkunde Alhuudiyankooɓe e Geresankooɓe jooɗiiɓe Efeesu fuu. Kulol nanngi ɓe fuu, innde Iisaa Joomiraaɗo teddinaa.
44019018	Heewɓe e goonɗinɓe ɓeen ngari, kaalti lutti ɗi ngaɗunoo.
44019019	Dabarankooɓe heewɓe kawrunduri dewte muɓɓen, mbuli ɗe yeeso yimɓe fuu. Ɓe kiisii coggu majje, ɓe tawi ina waɗa buuɗi cardi ujunaaje capanɗe joy.
44019020	Hono nii, haala Joomiraaɗo kaan ɓeydorii sankitaade e heewude semmbe.
44019021	Caggal ɗuum, Pool siini feƴƴitinde Makedoniya e Akaya faa fonndoo Urusaliima. O wi'i: —Si mi tilake toon fu, tilay mi yaha Roma du.
44019022	O neli gollidooɓe e makko ɗiɗo, Timote e Erasta, njaha Makedoniya. Kanko kaa, o heddii leydi Aasiya seeɗa.
44019023	Wakkati oon, fitina mawɗo waɗi saabe laawol Joomiraaɗo ngool.
44019024	Baylo tafoowo cardi bi'eteeɗo Demetirus ina tafa cuuroy cardi nanndukoy e suudu tooru wi'eteendu Artemis. Imo heɓa e majjum tino heewngo, kanko e gollooɓe makko.
44019025	O hawrunduri ɗum'en, kam'en e gollooɓe golle juuɗe hono maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: —Yigiraaɓe, oɗon anndi wo e gollal ngal jawdi meeɗen fuu ƴuuri.
44019026	Oɗon nji'a, oɗon nana no Pool oon heɓiri hakkillo yimɓe heewɓe, ina wosina ɗum'en, wanaa ley Efeesu ɗo tan, ley leyɗe Aasiya fuu. Imo wi'a ɓe kulle deweteeɗe ɗe yimɓe moƴƴiniri juuɗe muɓɓen ɗeen nganaa deweteeɗe.
44019027	Si jokkirii nii fu, yimɓe mbonnan golle meeɗen. Wanaa ɗum tan, yimɓe ndaardan suudu tooru Artemis nduun du hono ɓolum. Yimɓe celan teddinde tooru meeɗen mawndu ndu wonɓe Aasiya e adunaaru ndu fuu ndewata nduun.
44019028	Nde ɓe nannoo haalaaji ɗiin ndeen, ɓerɗe maɓɓe kuɓɓi, heddii iɓe peekoo, iɓe mbi'a: —Artemis Efeesunkooɓe wo mawɗo! Artemis Efeesunkooɓe wo mawɗo!
44019029	Ngalluure ndeen fuu jiiɓii. Jamaa oon fuu doggiri taliyaare fijo ndeen. Ɓe ndaasi Gayus e Aristarka Makedoniyankooɓe, yaadiraaɓe Pool ɓeen.
44019030	Pool ina yiɗi naatude hakkunde jamaa oon, ammaa taalibaaɓe ɓeen kaɗi mo.
44019031	Woɓɓe ley hooreeɓe leydi Aasiya, yigiraaɓe makko, neli e makko ina nyaagoo mo taa o naata taliyaare toon.
44019032	Wakkati oon, jamaa oon ina jiiɓii sanne. Ɓee ɗo ina mbullana ɗum, ɓee to ina mbullana ɗum ga. Ko ɓuri heewude e yimɓe ɓeen, anndaa fay ko waddi ɗum'en ɗoon.
44019033	Yoga e jamaa oon kaaltani haala ka gorko bi'eteeɗo Alesandere mo Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen ngaɗi kaaloowo muɓɓen. Alesandere muuyi jakkanaade yimɓe muuɗum ɓeen, de huncani jamaa oon junngo faa haalda e muɓɓen.
44019034	Ammaa nde ɓe annditinnoo wo o Alhuudiyanke ndeen, ɓe fuu ɓe keddii iɓe ƴeewnoo faa waɗi leeruuji ɗiɗi, iɓe mbi'a: —Artemis Efeesunkooɓe wo mawɗo!
44019035	Ko sakitii, binndoowo ngalluure ndeen deƴƴini jamaa oon, wi'i: —Onon Efeesunkooɓe, ngalluure Efeesu nde woni hayboore suudu dewal Artemis deweteeɗo mawɗo oon, kam e natal muuɗum ƴuurungal dow kammu ngaal. Yimɓe fuu na anndi ɗum.
44019036	Fay gooto waawaa yeddude ɗum. Ndelle oɗon njeyi jippinde hakkillooji mooɗon taa ngolliron fay huunde e henyaare.
44019037	Worɓe ɓe ngadduɗon ɓeen, nganaa wujjooɓe kulle suudu dewal, nganaa yennooɓe deweteeɗo meeɗen oon.
44019038	Si tawii Demetirus e tafooɓe cardi ɓeen ina ngoodi ko njiɗi wullitaade fu, nyalaaɗe careteeɗe ina ngoodi, sarotooɓe du na ngoodi.
44019039	De si na woodi ko pilotoɗon ko ɓuri ɗum fu, wo to kawrital saahiiɓe ɗum saroytee.
44019040	Eɗen mbaawi felireede muurtere waɗunde hannden ndeen, sabo fitina ga'uɗo nii walaa sabaabu fay gooto. Caggal haalaaji ɗiin, o yoofi jamaa oon sankitii.
44020001	Nde fitina oon faltinoo ndeen, Pool hawrunduri taalibaaɓe ɓeen, de semmbiniri ɗum'en e haala. Caggal ɗuum, waynii ɗum'en, fonndii Makedoniya.
44020002	O yiiltii ley leydi ndiin, imo semmbina yimɓe toon e waajuuji keewɗi. Caggal ɗuum, o yottii Geres.
44020003	O waɗi toon lebbi tati. Nde o segilinoo faa o naata laana yaade Siiriya fu, o nani Alhuudiyankooɓe ndawridii faa mbara mo. Ndelle o anniyii yeccoraade laawol Makedoniya.
44020004	Inan yaadiraaɓe makko: Sopater ɓii Pirrus jeyaaɗo Bereya, e Aristarka e Sekundus jeyaaɓe Tesaloniiki, e Gayus jeyaaɗo Derbe, e Timote. Wooɗi du Tikiku e Torofim jeyaaɓe leydi Aasiya.
44020005	Ɓeen ardii min, ndoomowi min wuro wi'eteengo Torowas.
44020006	Minen, min naati laana yaade Filipi caggal iidi buuru mo wattaaka rabilla. E ley balɗe joy min kewti ɓe Torowas, min ngaɗi ɗoon jeɗɗiire.
44020007	Nyannde arandeere e jeɗɗiire, tawi miɗen kawriti faa min keltoo buuru. Pool ina waajoo yimɓe ɓeen, sabo imo anniyii dillude jaango majjum. O heddii e waaju oon faa hakkunde jemma.
44020008	Lampe keewɗe ina ngoni e ley suudu dowuuru ndu min kawriti ley muuɗum nduun.
44020009	Suka jokolle bi'eteeɗo Ewtikus ina jooɗii dow feneetere. Ko Pool juutini waaju muuɗum oon ɗuum, Ewtikus ŋoŋi, faa ɗaanii ɗoyngol teddungol. O saami ƴuuwde e feneetere sooro tataɓo ngoon. Nde ɓe kuncunoo mo ndeen, tawi o maayii.
44020010	Ammaa Pool jippii, hippii e makko, hooƴi mo e juuɗe muuɗum, wi'i: —Mbaaltee! Yonki makko wartii!
44020011	Ndeen Pool ƴeenti, heltii buuru, nyaami. Caggal ɗuum, o warti e waaju makko faa weeti, de o dilli.
44020012	Suka jokolle oon hooraa ina wuuri. Ɗum waaltini ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne.
44020013	Minen, min artii yaade, min naati laana yaade Asos ɗo min njeyi nannude Pool, sabo imo anniyii yaarude toon koyɗe.
44020014	Nde min tawunduri Asos ndeen, min nanni mo laana, min njottii Mitilene.
44020015	Min ƴuwi ɗoon e laana, min njottowii jaango muuɗum yeeso ruunde Kiyos. Faɓɓi-jaango muuɗum min paltorii ɗakkol ruunde Samos, de faɓɓiti-janngo mum min njottii Miletus.
44020016	Pool anniyii wosaade Efeesu, faa taa ɓooya ley leydi Aasiya ndiin. Imo henyanii yottaade Urusaliima nyannde iidi ɓenndal alkama si tawii na laatoo.
44020017	Nde Pool wonnoo Miletus ndeen, nelani hooreeɓe kawrital goonɗinɓe Efeesu ɓeen.
44020018	Nde ɓe ngarnoo ndeen, o wi'i ɓe: —Oɗon anndi no ngorrumi e mooɗon gilla nde koyngal am naatunoo e leydi Aasiya ndi faa warde hannden.
44020019	Mi golliranii Joomiraaɗo leeƴinkinaare fuu, kam e gonɗi keewɗi e torraaji ɗi Alhuudiyankooɓe umminani kam ɗiin.
44020020	Oɗon anndi mi suuɗaay on huunde fuu ko nafata on, mi waajake on, mi jannginii on hakkunde yimɓe e ley galleeji mooɗon.
44020021	Mi tindinii Alhuudiyankooɓe e Geresankooɓe fuu tuubana Laamɗo, ngoonɗina Joomiraaɗo meeɗen Iisaa.
44020022	Joonin, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo na yaara kam Urusaliima, mi anndaa ko hewtoytoo kam toon.
44020023	Ko anndumi tan, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo oon na holla kam ley gure ɗeen fuu ina wi'a kam geƴƴelle e torraaji ina ndoomi kam.
44020024	De miin kaa, mi hiisaaki nguurndam am e maayde am fuu si mi timminii daɗundurgol, mi heɓii yottinde gollal ngal Iisaa Joomiraaɗo halfini kam ngaal. Gollal ngaal woni seedaade Kabaaru Lobbo haala hinney Laamɗo.
44020025	Mi yiilake hakkunde mooɗon, miɗo waajoo haala laamu Laamɗo. De joonin miɗo anndi on nji'oytaa kam katin.
44020026	Ɗum waɗi de miɗo sappoo on hannden ɗum ɗo: si tawii gooto mooɗon halkii, wanaa feloore am.
44020027	Sabo mi waajake on anniyaaji Laamɗo fuu, mi suuɗaay on fay huunde.
44020028	Ndeenee ko'e mooɗon, ndeenon coggal ngal Ruuhu Ceniiɗo halfini on faa kaybon ngaal. Laatoɗon durooɓe kawrital goonɗinɓe Laamɗo, ngal soodiri ƴiiƴam ɓiyum.
44020029	Miin, miɗo anndi caggal am yimɓe bonɓe cooroto e ley mooɗon hono no pobbi jolbuɗi, katin du ɗi accataa coggal ngaal.
44020030	Fay e ley mooɗon danyan worɓe ummiiɓe ina mbaajoo waajuuji fewreeji faa pooɗa taalibaaɓe ɓeen njokka ɗum'en.
44020031	Ɗum le, kakkilon! Miccitoɗon, jemma e nyalooma fuu faa waɗi duuɓi tati, mi selaay tindinirde gooto mooɗon fuu e gonɗi.
44020032	Joonin, miɗo halfina on Laamɗo, e konngol hinney muuɗum. Konngol ngool ina waawi semmbinde on e ley goonɗinal mon, hokka on ko resani seniiɓe fuu.
44020033	Abada mi muuyaay fay huunde e mooɗon, wanaa cardi, wanaa kaŋŋe, wanaa kaddule.
44020034	Onon e ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi juuɗe am ɗe kumti haajuuji am e haajuuji wonduɓe e am.
44020035	Mi hollii on e kabaaruuji ɗiin fuu, sanaa ngolliron noon, mballon tampuɓe. E ley ɗuum fuu, miccoɗon ɗii ɗo haalaaji ɗi Joomiraaɗo meeɗen Iisaa haali kam e hoorem: «Kokkuɗo ɓuri kokkaaɗo barke.»
44020036	Nde Pool tilinoo haalde ɗum ndeen, kam e maɓɓe fuu ɓe kofii, ɓe ndu'ii.
44020037	Ɓe fuu ɓe mboyi bojji mawɗi, ɓe kippii e Pool, ɓe muccii ɗum.
44020038	Ko ɓuri mettude ɓe fu, ko o wi'i ɓe nji'ataa mo katin ɗuum. Caggal ɗuum, ɓe ɗowti mo faa o naata laana maayo.
44021001	Nde min ceedunoo e maɓɓe ndeen, min naati laana maayo, min mbosaaki, min njehi ruunde Kos. Jaango majjum, min njehi ruunde Rodosa. Min ƴuwi ɗoon, min njottii wuro Patara.
44021002	Min keɓi laana peƴƴitooha yaade leydi Finisi. Min naati, min ndunnyi.
44021003	Nde min njahunoo faa min kaynii Ruunde Kipirus ɗakkol amin gere nano fu, min ponndii leydi Siiriya. Min njottii toon, min njippii wuro wi'eteengo Tirus. Wo ɗoon laana kaan jippinta gineeji muuɗum.
44021004	Min tawi taalibaaɓe, min ngondi e muɓɓen ɗoon balɗe jeɗɗi. Iɓe mbiira Pool ley Ruuhu Ceniiɗo taa yaha Urusaliima.
44021005	Nde jeɗɗiire ndeen hiɓɓunoo ndeen, min ndilli. Ɓe fuu ɓe ɗowti min faa min njalti wuro ngoon, kamɓe e rewɓe e sukaaɓe. Min kofii hunnduko maayo manngo, min ndu'ii.
44021006	Nde min mbaynundurnoo ndeen, minen kaa min naati laana, kamɓe du ɓe njeccii cuuɗi maɓɓe.
44021007	Nde min naatunoo laana Tirus min ndilli fu, min njehi Potolemayis. Min njowtowi sakiraaɓe toon, min nyallidi e maɓɓe, min mbaali.
44021008	Jaango majjum, min ndilli ɗoon, min njehi Kaysariya. Min naatowi suudu Filipu baajotooɗo Kabaaru Lobbo oon, min njippanii ɗum. Wo o gooto hakkunde suɓaaɓe njeɗɗo Urusaliima ɓeen.
44021009	Imo jogii ɓiɓɓe rewɓe nayo ɓe ɓaŋaaka, haaldooɓe annabaaku.
44021010	Nde min ngaɗunoo ɗoon balɗe seeɗa fu, annabaajo bi'eteeɗo Agabus ƴuuri Yahuudiya,
44021011	wari to amin. O hooƴi kaɓɓorgol Pool, o haɓɓi juuɗe makko e koyɗe makko. O wi'i: —Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i: nii Alhuudiyankooɓe wonɓe Urusaliima ɓeen kaɓɓirta jeyɗo kaɓɓorgol ngol oon, ngatta ɗum e juuɗe yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiya'en.
44021012	Nde min nannoo ɗum ndeen, minen e jeyaaɓe ɗoon ɓeen fuu, min nyaagii Pool taa yaha Urusaliima.
44021013	Pool kaa jaabii, wi'i: —Ɗume waɗi de oɗon mboya, oɗon keccinɗina ɓernde am? Miin, miɗo segilanii ko wanaa haɓɓeede tan, miɗo segilanii fay maayde ley Urusaliima saabe innde Iisaa Joomiraaɗo.
44021014	Nde min paamunoo min mbaawaay waylitinde anniya makko ndeen, min celi mo, min mbi'i: —Joomiraaɗo waɗa muuyɗe muuɗum!
44021015	Nde waɗunoo balɗe seeɗa fu, min cegilii, de min ponndii Urusaliima.
44021016	Taalibaaɓe Kaysariya woɓɓe njaadi e amin, njaari min galle gorko bi'eteeɗo Manason faa min njippanoo ɗum. Manason wo jeyaaɗo Kipirus, laatiiɗo taalibaajo gilla ko ɓooyi.
44021017	Nde min njottinoo Urusaliima ndeen, sakiraaɓe ɓeen njaɓɓorii min seyo.
44021018	Jaango majjum, min njaadi e Pool to Yaakuuba. Mawɓe kawrital goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu ina tawaa toon.
44021019	Caggal ko o jowti ɓe ɗuum, o fillitanii ɓe huunde fuu ko Laamɗo waɗani yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe saabe golle makko.
44021020	Nde ɓe nannoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe njetti Laamɗo. Ɓe mbi'i Pool: —Sakiike amin, a yi'ii Alhuudiyankooɓe ujunaaje ngoonɗinii. Faa hannden iɓe tinnii e jokkude Tawreeta Muusaa.
44021021	Ɓe kaalanaama aɗa janngina Alhuudiyankooɓe wonɓe hakkunde lenyi goɗɗi njoppa Tawreeta Muusaa, mbiiɗaa taa taada sukaaɓe muɓɓen katin, taa njokka al'aadaaji ɗiin katin.
44021022	Ndelle, noy ngaɗeten? Sabo tannyoral ɓe nanan a warii.
44021023	Waɗu ko min kaalante ɗuum. Miɗen njogii ɗo worɓe nayo waɗanɓe Laamɗo hunayeere.
44021024	Yaadu e maɓɓe, de laamnidaa hoore maa e maɓɓe, njoɓaa ko ɓe kaani yoɓude ɗuum, faa ɓe laɓee. Ndeen yimɓe fuu anndan ko haaletee dow maaɗa ɗuum fuu wanaa goonga. Ɓe anndan aan e hoore maa aɗa jokki Tawreeta Muusaa.
44021025	Goonɗinɓe ƴuuruɓe e lenyi goɗɗi ɓeen, min mbinndanii ɗum'en ndeentoo e ko hirsanaa tooruuji e ƴiiƴam e ko saaɗi, kam e jeenu.
44021026	Pool hooƴi worɓe ɓeen, yaadi e muɓɓen. Jaango majjum, o laamnidaa e muɓɓen laaɓal diina. O naati suudu dewal mawndu nduun, o haalani almaami'en ɓeen. O wi'i si nyalaaɗe laamnugol ɗeen kiɓɓii fu, mono e maɓɓe fuu waɗanee sadaka.
44021027	Nde balɗe jeɗɗi ɗeen ɓadinoo hiɓɓude ndeen, Alhuudiyankooɓe woɓɓe ƴuuruɓe leydi Aasiya nji'i Pool e ley suudu dewal mawndu nduun. Ɓe ummini hakkillooji yimɓe ɓeen fuu, ɓe nanngi mo.
44021028	Iɓe peekoo, iɓe mbi'a: —Israa'iilankooɓe, mballee min! O woni gorko jannginoowo yimɓe e ley nokkuuje ɗeen fuu ina liddoo yimɓe lenyol meeɗen, ina liddoo Tawreeta meeɗen, ina liddoo nokku ceniiɗo o. Joonin kaa, o waddii fay Geresankooɓe e ley suudu dewal mawndu ndu. O tuuninii nokku ceniiɗo o!
44021029	Walaa ko ɓe mbiiri noon si wanaa ko ɓe njiinoo Torofim Efeesunke oon ina wondi e Pool ley ngalluure ndeen. Iɓe cikka Pool nanniino mo e ley suudu dewal mawndu nduun.
44021030	Jirkitaango ngoon huuɓi ngalluure ndeen. Yimɓe ina njaltira tatteeji ɗiin fuu. Ɓe nanngi Pool, ɓe ndaasi ɗum faa ɓe mburtini ɗum suudu dewal mawndu nduun, de ɓe ommbi dammbuɗe ɗeen wakkati oon law.
44021031	Nde ɓe pilotonoo faa ɓe mbara Pool ndeen, tawi hooreejo sordaasiiɓe oon humpitake Urusaliima fuu jiiɓake.
44021032	Wakkati oon, o hooƴi sordaasiiɓe e mawɓe muɓɓen, o doggani jamaa oon. Nde yimɓe ɓeen njiinoo mo kanko e sordaasiiɓe ɓeen ndeen, celi fiyude Pool.
44021033	Hooreejo oon ɓattii Pool, yamiri Pool nanngee, haɓɓiree callali ɗiɗi. O ƴami, —Gorko o wo moy? Ɗume o waɗi?
44021034	Jamaa oon ina feekoo. Ɓee ina ƴeewnoo ɗum, ɓee to ina ƴeewnoo ɗum to. Duko jiiɓiiko koon haɗi mo faamude. Ndelle o yamiri Pool yaaree ley suudu sooro sordaasiiɓe toon.
44021035	Nde Pool warnoo faa ƴeeŋa kalikali sooro oon, sordaasiiɓe ɓeen ndonndii mo saabe nyanngere jamaa ndeen,
44021036	sabo yimɓe heewɓe ina njokki mo ina peekoo, ina mbi'a: —Ittu yonki makko!
44021037	Nde sordaasiiɓe ɓeen ngarnoo faa nanna Pool ley sooro muɓɓen ndeen, Pool wi'i hooreejo oon: —Ina daganoo kam mi haalda e maa naa? Oon wi'i mo: —Aa? Aɗa waawi geresankoore naa?
44021038	Ndelle a wanaa Misiranke gaɗuɗo muurtere ko ɓooyaay oon naa? A wanaa garduɗo e waɗooɓe bar-ko'e ujunaaje nayo, de njaaruɗaa ɗum'en ley ladde naa?
44021039	Pool jaabii, wi'i: —Miin, mi Alhuudiyanke dimaaɗo Tarsus ley leydi Silisi. Ngalluure ndeen wanaa nde anndaaka koy. Miɗo nyaage nduŋanoɗaa kam mi haalda e yimɓe ɓeen.
44021040	Hooreejo oon duŋanii mo ɗum. Pool darii e dow ƴeentirde ndeen, ɓantani yimɓe ɓeen junngo. Nde ɓe ndeƴƴininoo ndeen, o haali e ibraninkoore, o wi'i:
44022001	—Sakiraaɓe e baabiraaɓe, kettinee joonin faa mi seedanoo on mi jeyaa feloore nde njowuɗon dow am.
44022002	Nde ɓe nannoo wo ibraninkoore o haaldata e maɓɓe fu, deƴƴinaare ndeen ɓeydii katin. O wi'i:
44022003	—Wo mi Alhuudiyanke dimaaɗo Tarsus ley leydi Silisi. Ammaa Urusaliima ɗo mawnumi. Gamaliyel wonnoo moodibbo am. Kanko janngini kam Tawreeta maamiraaɓe meeɗen oon faa laaɓi tal. Miɗo jinngana Laamɗo hono no ngorruɗon hannden on fuu ni.
44022004	Mi torrii jokkuɓe Laawol ngool faa maayi. Mi nanngii worɓe e rewɓe, mi uddii ɗum'en ley kasu.
44022005	Almaami Mawɗo e waalde Saahiiɓe ɓeen fuu ina ceedanoo kam, kam'en du. Wo e muɓɓen keɓumi ɗerewol faa mi holla sakiraaɓe muɓɓen wonɓe Damas ɓeen. De njahumi faa mi haɓɓowa jokkuɓe laawol Iisaa wonɓe toon ɓeen, faa mi wadda ɗum'en Urusaliima faa njukkee.
44022006	Wooɗi, miɗo yaha faa ɓadiimi Damas, wakkati hakkunde naange. Wakkati gooto annoora mawɗo ƴuuri dow kammu, yayni, fiilii kam.
44022007	Caamumi e leydi, nanumi daande ina wi'a kam: «Sool, Sool, ko waɗi de aɗa torra kam?»
44022008	Njaabiimi, mbiimi: «Aan wo a moy, joomam?» Nde mbi'unoomi noon fu, o wi'i kam: «Miin, wo mi Iisaa Nasaraatuujo mo torrataa oon.»
44022009	Wonduɓe e am ɓeen nji'i annoora oon, ammaa ɓe nanaay daande haaldunde e am ndeen.
44022010	Ndeen, mbiimi: «Joomiraaɗo, ɗume ngaɗammi?» Joomiraaɗo wi'i kam: «Umma, yahu Damas. A haalante toon ko Laamɗo anniyii ngaɗaa fuu.»
44022011	Wonduɓe e am ɓeen ɗowi kam, njaari kam faa ley Damas, sabo ɗelkugol annoora ngool wumnii kam.
44022012	Ananiyas wo gorko kulɗo Laamɗo, jokkuɗo Tawreeta Muusaa. Alhuudiyankooɓe wonɓe toon fuu ceedanii mo wo o moƴƴo.
44022013	O wari, o darii yeeso am, o wi'i kam: «Sool, sakiike am, wumtu!» De wakkati oon ni, mbumtumi, njiimi mo.
44022014	O wi'i: «Laamɗo maamiraaɓe meeɗen oon suɓake ma faa paama muuyɗe muuɗum, faa nji'aa Ponnditiiɗo oon, nanaa haala e hunnduko muuɗum.
44022015	Sabo aan seedantoo mo yeeso yimɓe fuu ko njiiɗaa e ko nanuɗaa.
44022016	Joonin, ɗume ndoomataa katin? Umma, looteɗaa lootagal batisima, de njaaforeɗaa lutti maa e noddude innde Joomiraaɗo.»
44022017	Caggal mi yeccake Urusaliima, miɗo waɗa du'aare ley suudu dewal mawndu, de won ko njiimi e holleede.
44022018	Ley holleede oon mi yi'ii Joomiraaɗo, wi'i kam: «Henya law, yaltu Urusaliima, sabo ɓe njaɓataa seedaaku ngu ceedantoɗaa kam nguun.»
44022019	Njaabiimi, mbiimi: «Joomiraaɗo, iɓe anndi miɗo yahannoo ley cuuɗi baajorɗi ɗiin fuu, miɗo uddannoo miɗo fiyannoo goonɗinɓe ma ɓeen.
44022020	Nde ƴiiƴam Etiyen seedee maaɗa oon yuppetenoo ndeen, miɗo darii, iɗum weli kam ko o waraa ɗuum. Miin haybannoo kaddule warɓe mo ɓeen.»
44022021	Joomiraaɗo jaabii kam, wi'i: «Yahu, mi nulete to woɗɗi, to yimɓe ɓe nganaa Alhuudiyankooɓe.»
44022022	Iɓe kettinanii mo faa o haali haala ka. Ndeen ɓe ƴepti daaɗe maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i: —Ittu mo e adunaaru ndu! O haanaa wuurude katin!
44022023	Iɓe peekoo, iɓe njiila saayaaji maɓɓe, iɓe mbicca leydi.
44022024	Hooreejo oon yamiri Pool yaaree ley suudu sooro muɓɓen ɗoon, lamndoree piiɗe faa ɓe paama ko waɗi de jamaa oon ina wulla e makko hono ni.
44022025	Nde ɓe kaɓɓannoo mo faa ɓe piya mo ndeen, o wi'i mawɗo sordaasiiɓe gonɗo ɗoon: —Yalla na daganoo on piyon Romanke, sakko mo saraaka naa?
44022026	Nde mawɗo oon nannoo ɗum ndeen, yehi to hooreejo muɓɓen oon, wi'i: —Aɗa anndi ko nesuɗaa waɗude naa? Gorko oon wo Romanke!
44022027	Ndeen hooreejo oon wari to Pool, ƴami ɗum, wi'i: —Haalanam, yalla a Romanke naa? Pool jaabii, wi'i: —Wo mi kam!
44022028	Ndeen hooreejo oon jaabii, wi'i: —Miin kaa, ceede keewɗe njoɓumi de keɓumi laataade Romanke. Pool wi'i mo: —Miin, mi finii tawumi mi kam.
44022029	Wakkati oon anniyiiɓe fiyude mo faa tilsinana mo haaltude ɓeen acciti. Hooreejo oon huli, sabo anndii Pool wo Romanke wooɗi haɓɓiino ɗum.
44022030	Jaango majjum, hooreejo oon haɓɓiti Pool, sabo na yiɗi tannyorde ko Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen mbullitii ɗum. O yamiri hooreeɓe almaami'en e waalde Saahiiɓe ndeen fuu kawrita. Caggal ɗuum, o waddi Pool, o darni ɗum yeeso maɓɓe.
44023001	Pool ndaari waalde Saahiiɓe ɓeen, wi'i: —Sakiraaɓe, wo ɓernde nde walaa feloore mbuurdumi yeeso Joomiraaɗo faa yottaade nyalooma hannden o.
44023002	Ndeen Ananiyas, Almaami Mawɗo oon, yamiri darinooɓe ɗakkol makko ɓeen piya mo hunnduko.
44023003	Ndeen, Pool wi'i mo: —Laamɗo fiyete, aan kokuwol dawninaangol nanndungol wo lobbol! Aɗa jooɗii faa caroroɗaa kam e Tawreeta Muusaa, de a luttii Tawreeta Muusaa ko njamirɗaa mi fiyee ɗuum.
44023004	Darinooɓe ɗoon ɓeen mbi'i Pool: —Yalla a mbonkoto Almaami Mawɗo mo Laamɗo joƴƴini o naa?
44023005	Pool jaabii, wi'i: —Sakiraaɓe, mi faamaayno yalla wo o Almaami Mawɗo. Si goonga, miɗo anndi ina winndaa: «Taa mbonka hooreejo lenyol maa!»
44023006	Pool ina anndi woɓɓe ley Saahiiɓe ɓeen wo Saduki'en, woɓɓe muɓɓen du wo Farisa'en. Ndelle ƴeewnii semmbe hakkunde kawrital ɗoon, wi'i: —Sakiraaɓe, miin mi Farisanke, ɓii Farisanke. Wo saabe yowugol jikke e ummital maayɓe carorteemi!
44023007	Nde o haalnoo ɗum ndeen, Farisa'en e Saduki'en ɓeen njeddunduri, kawrital ngaal feccii.
44023008	Sabo Saduki'en ina mbi'a ummital walaa, maleyka'en ngalaa, ruuhuuji du ngalaa. Ammaa Farisa'en ina ngoonɗini ɗum fuu.
44023009	Duko koon ɓeydii mawnude. Jannginooɓe Tawreeta woɓɓe heedanɓe Farisa'en ɓeen, na ngaɗa kalala mawɗo, ina mbi'a: —Walaa fuu ko boni ko min nji'i e gorko o! Ina waawi taweede ruuhu naa maleyka haaldi e makko!
44023010	Jeddi ɗiin mawni faa hooreejo sordaasiiɓe oon huli taa ɓe ceeka Pool. Ɗum waɗi de o yamiri sordaasiiɓe njippoo to kawrital toon, itta Pool e juuɗe yimɓe ɓeen, njeccina ɗum to suudu sooro muɓɓen toon.
44023011	Jemma jokkuɗo oon, Joomiraaɗo ɓangi e Pool, wi'i ɗum: —Sellin ɓernde maa! No ceedoraniɗaa kam Urusaliima noon, na tilsi ceedanoɗaa kam ley Roma du.
44023012	Nde weetunoo ndeen, Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen mbati, kunii nyaamataa njarataa sanaa nde mbari Pool.
44023013	Batidinɓe ɓeen ina ɓuri worɓe capanɗe nayo.
44023014	Ɓe njehi to hooreeɓe almaami'en e mawɓe, ɓe mbi'i: —Min kunake hunayeere fay huunde min nyaamataa min njarataa gilla joonin, sanaa nde min mbari Pool.
44023015	Joonin, onon e waalde Saahiiɓe ɓeen, mbi'ee hooreejo sordaasiiɓe oon waddana on Pool. Mbi'on oɗon njiɗi faamitaade ko o haalata ɗuum. Minen, miɗen cegilii faa min mbara mo gilla o yottaaki.
44023016	Ɓii sakiike Pool debbo nani ko ɓe anniyii ɗuum, yehi to suudu sordaasiiɓe toon, naati, humpiti Pool.
44023017	Pool noddi gooto e mawɓe sordaasiiɓe ɓeen, wi'i ɗum: —Yaaru suka gorko o to hooreejo toon, sabo won ko o yiɗi haalande ɗum.
44023018	Mawɗo sordaasiiɓe oon yaari mo to hooreejo muuɗum toon, wi'i ɗum: —Pool ommbaaɗo oon noddi kam, nyaagii kam mi wadda suka gorko o to maa, sabo won ko o yiɗi haalande ma.
44023019	Hooreejo oon nanngi junngo makko, toowtidi e makko, de ƴami mo: —Ɗume kaalantaa kam?
44023020	Suka oon wi'i mo: —Alhuudiyankooɓe ndawridii. Ɓe nanndinkinto e yiɗuɓe faamitaade kabaaru Pool. Ɓe nyaagete jaango ngaddanaa ɓe Pool yeeso waalde Saahiiɓe ndeen.
44023021	Taa njaɓanaa ɓe! Sabo ko ɓuri worɓe capanɗe nayo na ɗuppinanii mo, kunake nyaamataa njarataa si mbaraay mo. Ɓe cegilake, iɓe ndoomi yamiroore maa.
44023022	Hooreejo oon wi'i suka gorko oon: —Taa haalan fay gooto yalla a faaminii kam ɗum. O yoppi ɗum dilli.
44023023	Caggal ɗuum, o noddi mawɓe sordaasiiɓe makko ɗiɗo, o wi'i ɗum'en: —Kawrunduree worɓe keme ɗiɗo e waɗɗiiɓe pucci capanɗe njeɗɗo, kam e jom'en labbe keme ɗiɗo. On fuu, cegilanee yaade Kaysariya wakkati yamnde jeenay jemma.
44023024	Cegilee pucci faa njaaron Pool e jam, to Filiki goforneer oon.
44023025	Hooreejo oon winndi ɓataaki ki, wi'i:
44023026	Miin, Kalawdiyus Lisiya, miɗo jowte, aan Filiki goforneer tedduɗo.
44023027	Gorko mo neldumaami o, wo Alhuudiyankooɓe nanngunoo ɗum, anniyii warude ɗum. Nde kumpitinoomi o Romanke ndeen, naatumi, miin e fedde sordaasiiɓe ndeen, ittumi mo.
44023028	Ngaddumi mo yeeso waalde Saahiiɓe maɓɓe, sabo miɗo yiɗi faamude ko ɓe peldi mo ɗuum.
44023029	Tawumi wo dow sariya maɓɓe tan ɓe peldi mo, de ɗum wanaa huunde waawunde warude mo naa uddude mo.
44023030	Caggal ɗuum, maatumi Alhuudiyankooɓe ndawridii faa mbara mo. Ɗum waɗi de neldumaami mo wakkati oon. Mi yamirii felooɓe mo ɓeen du njaha to maa, pela mo toon.
44023031	Sordaasiiɓe ɓeen ngaɗi ko njamiraa ɗuum, kooƴi Pool ley jemma, njaari ɗum faa Antipatiri.
44023032	Jaango majjum, sordaasiiɓe yaarannooɓe e koyɗe ɓeen njeccii to suudu muɓɓen Urusaliima. Ɓe njoppidi Pool e waɗɗiiɓe pucci ɓeen, njottinowa ɗum.
44023033	Nde ɓeen njottinoo Kaysariya ndeen, kokki goforneer oon ɓataaki kiin, njoppi Pool e junngo makko.
44023034	Nde goforneer oon janngunoo ɓataaki kiin fu, ƴami toy Pool jeyaa. Nde nannoo wo Silisi o jeyaa ndeen,
44023035	wi'i mo: —Mi nanan haala maa si felooɓe ma ɓeen ngarii. O yamiri Pool doomowee to suudu Hirudus laamordu toon.
44024001	Balɗe joy caggal ɗuum, Ananiyas Almaami Mawɗo oon yottii Kaysariya. Imo wondi e mawɓe woɓɓe, kam e jannguɗo sariya Roma'en bi'eteeɗo Tertulu. Ɓe peli Pool yeeso goforneer oon.
44024002	Nde Pool noddanoo ndeen, Tertulu fuɗɗi felude mo yeeso kaananke oon, wi'i: —Filiki kaananke tedduɗo, wo saabe maaɗa de min keɓi jam ɓooyɗo. Wooɗi ko moƴƴinaa ley lenyol ngol du wo haybugol maaɗa waɗi.
44024003	Min annditii fuu ko ngaɗuɗaa, yimɓe tatteeji fuu na njettire ɓerɗe belɗe.
44024004	Mi yiɗaa joonnde ndeen juuta, de miɗo nyaage saabe moƴƴuki maa, kettindanoɗaa min seeɗa.
44024005	Min tawii gorko o wo daaɓoowo bone sanne. Wo o gaddoowo fitina hakkunde Alhuudiyankooɓe wonɓe ley adunaaru fuu. O ardiiɗo laawol Nasaraatunkooɓe.
44024006	O filake tuuninde suudu dewal mawndu nduun, de min nanngi mo. [
44024007	Miɗen njiɗi saraade mo sariya amin, tawi Lisiya hooreejo sordaasiiɓe oon ittirii mo semmbe e juuɗe amin, yamiri felooɓe mo ɓeen ngara yeeso maa.]
44024008	Aan e hoore maa, lamndoɗaa mo, paamaa ko min peldi mo ɗuum fuu.
44024009	Alhuudiyankooɓe tawaaɓe toon ɓeen keedani kaaloowo oon, mbi'i noon jaati worri.
44024010	Ndeen Filiki, goforneer oon, hokki Pool laawol faa haala. Pool wi'i: —Miɗo anndi waɗii duuɓi aɗa saroo lenyol ngol. Ɗum waɗi de miɗo seyoroo jakkanaade hoore am.
44024011	Ɓuraa balɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ko ngarumi Urusaliima faa mi sujidana Laamɗo. Si a taykake fu, a tawan hono noon worri.
44024012	Fay gooto tawaay kam miɗo dukida e neɗɗo naa miɗo jirkita jamaa, wanaa e ley suudu dewal mawndu nduun, wanaa e ley cuuɗi baajorɗi, wanaa e ley ngalluure ndeen.
44024013	Ɓe mbaawaa tabintinde ko ɓe peldi kam joonin ɗuum.
44024014	Ammaa miɗo jaɓi yeeso maa: miɗo rewri Laamɗo maamiraaɓe meeɗen oon e laawol ngol ɓe mbi'ata feerewol ngool. Miɗo goonɗini ko winndaa e Tawreeta Muusaa ɗuum e ko winndaa e dewte annabaaɓe ɗuum fuu.
44024015	Wooɗi, miɗo tannyori Laamɗo iirtinan fonnditiiɓe e bonɓe fuu, hono no Alhuudiyankooɓe du tannyori ni.
44024016	Saabe ɗuum miɗo tinnoo wondude e ɓernde nde walaa feloore yeeso Laamɗo e yeeso yimɓe wakkati fuu.
44024017	Caggal duuɓi keewɗi, mi wartii faa mi waɗana yimɓe am dokke, mi itta sadakaaji.
44024018	Wakkati oon ɓe tawi kam e ley suudu dewal mawndu nduun caggal ko ngaɗumi al'aada senagol. Mi waldaa e jamaa, mi waldaa e duko.
44024019	Alhuudiyankooɓe woɓɓe ƴuuruɓe leydi Aasiya wonnooɓe ɗoon, wo ɓeen kaannoo warude pela kam yeeso maa, si tawii won ko ngaɗumi.
44024020	Yimɓe ɓee ɗo, sanaa kam'en e ko'e muɓɓen kaala boofi ɗi nji'i e am nde ndarinoomi yeeso waalde Alhuudiyankooɓe Saahiiɓe ndeen.
44024021	Ɓe mbaawaa wiide mi waɗii faa'e si wanaa konngol gootol ngol ndariimi de ƴeewniimi: «Wo saabe ummital maayɓe waɗi de miɗo saree hannden!»
44024022	Filiki oon, na anndi laawol Iisaa ngool, hanti haala, wi'i: —Si Lisiya hooreejo sordaasiiɓe oon warii fu, ndeen carotoomi haala mooɗon ka.
44024023	O yamiri mawɗo sordaasiiɓe oon hayba Pool, de newnana ɗum, taa haɗa fay gooto e yigiraaɓe muuɗum ɓeen warude walla ɗum.
44024024	Balɗe seeɗa caggal ɗuum, Filiki wardi e deekum Alhuudiyanke bi'eteeɗo Durusiila. O neli Pool waddowaa, o hettindanii ɗum ina haala haala goonɗinal Iisaa Almasiihu.
44024025	Kaa nde Pool haalannoo haala fonnditaare e nanngitaare e sariya garoowo ndeen, Filiki huli, wi'i: —Joonin kaa heƴii! Yahu. Nde keɓindiimi fuu, mi nodditete.
44024026	O miilii Pool hokkan mo ceede. Ɗum waɗi de imo nodda ɗum kile keewɗe faa ɓe njewtida.
44024027	Nde waɗunoo duuɓi ɗiɗi fu, Porsiyus Festus loomti Filiki, laatii kaananke. Ammaa Filiki yoppi Pool e ley kasu ɗoon, sabo na yiɗi welnande Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen.
44025001	Balɗe tati caggal ko Festus wari e ley leydi ndiin ɗuum, ƴuwi Kaysariya, yehi Urusaliima.
44025002	Ɗoon, hooreeɓe almaami'en e ardiiɓe Alhuudiyankooɓe ngari to makko de peli Pool. Ɓe nyaagii mo semmbe
44025003	o walla ɓe, o wadda Pool Urusaliima. Ko ɓe mbiiri mo noon dey, iɓe piloo ɗuppinanaade ɗum dow laawol faa ɓe mbara ɗum.
44025004	Festus jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Pool ina uddii ley kasu Kaysariya toon. Miin e hoore am du, mi yeccoto wuro ngoon law.
44025005	Mawɓe mooɗon ngara njaada e am Kaysariya, pela gorko oon si tawii won ko waɗi.
44025006	Festus waddaay e maɓɓe ko ɓuri balɗe jeetati naa sappo, de yeccii Kaysariya. Jaango majjum, o jooɗowii to sarorde toon, o yamiri Pool waddee.
44025007	Nde Pool yottinoo ndeen, Alhuudiyankooɓe ƴuuruɓe Urusaliima ɓeen piilii ɗum, peldi ɗum kulle bonɗe keewɗe. Ammaa ɓe mbaawaay laaɓinde pelooje ɗeen.
44025008	Ndeen Pool jakkanii hoore muuɗum, ina wi'a: —Mi waɗaay ko boni, wanaa e sariya Alhuudiyankooɓe oon, wanaa e suudu dewal mawndu nduun, wanaa e kaananke Roma mawɗo oon du.
44025009	Festus ina yiɗi welnande Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen. Ndelle ƴami Pool, wi'i: —Aɗa jaɓa yaade Urusaliima faa mi sarowoo toon kabaaru maa oon naa?
44025010	Nde o ƴamunoo ɗuum fu, Pool jaabii, wi'i: —Wo e sarorde kaananke Roma mawɗo ngonumi, wo ɗo kaanumi sareede. Mi waɗaay Alhuudiyankooɓe ɓeen fuu ko boni. Aan e hoore maa du, aɗa anndi.
44025011	Si mi waɗii ko boni, ko foti warude kam fu, mi salataako wareede. Ammaa si fay huunde e ko ɓe peldi kam ɗuum wanaa goonga fu, fay gooto waawaa wattude kam e juuɗe maɓɓe. Sariya am faltake ɗo. Wo kaananke Roma mawɗo oon, kam sarotoo kam.
44025012	Caggal nde Festus haaldunoo e tindinooɓe ɗum ndeen, jaabii Pool, wi'i: —Aɗa yiɗi kaananke Roma mawɗo sare, ndelle a yahan to kaananke Roma mawɗo oon!
44025013	Balɗe seeɗa caggal ɗuum, Agirippa kaananke oon e Bereniika, sakiike mum debbo, ngari Kaysariya faa njowta Festus.
44025014	Nde ɓe ɓooytunoo ɗoon balɗe seeɗa fu, Festus haalani kaananke oon haala Pool, wi'i: —Ina woodi gorko mo Filiki yoppi ɗo ley kasu.
44025015	Nde njahunoomi Urusaliima ndeen, hooreeɓe almaami'en e mawɓe Alhuudiyankooɓe kaalanii kam haala makko, nyaagii kam mi saroo mo o jukkee.
44025016	Njaabiimi ɓe: Al'aada Romankooɓe jaɓataa saraade neɗɗo si hawritaay e felooɓe ɗum ɓeen. Sanaa tawee ina fotti faa jaaboo ko feldaa ɗuum.
44025017	Ndelle ɓe fuu ɓe ngarii ɗo. Miin le, mi neeɓinaay ɗum fes, sabo jaango majjum njooɗowiimi to sarorde toon, njamirmi gorko oon waddee.
44025018	Felooɓe mo ɓeen ndarii, kaali, de ɓe ngaddaay fay feloore wootere ko nanndani kam wo bonanda.
44025019	Ɓe peldii mo haala diina maɓɓe, kam e gooto bi'eteeɗo Iisaa maayɗo, mo Pool wi'ata ina wuuri.
44025020	Wooɗi miin kaa, mi yi'aay fuu no njiitirammi goonga e haala kaan. Ɗum waɗi de lamndiimi mo yalla imo jaɓa saroweede Urusaliima.
44025021	Ammaa o nyaagake kabaaru makko wattee e juuɗe kaananke mawɗo oon. Ndelle njamirmi o haybee faa mi heɓa neldude mo kaananke Roma mawɗo oon.
44025022	Agirippa wi'i Festus: —Miɗo yiɗi hettindanaade gorko o, miin e hoore am. Festus wi'i: —A hettindanto mo jaango.
44025023	Jaango majjum, Agirippa e Bereniika ngardi e ƴukkinaare mawnde, naati e ley sarordu nduun, kam'en e hooreeɓe sordaasiiɓe e mawɓe ngalluure ndeen. Festus yamiri Pool waddee.
44025024	Nde waddanoo fu, Festus wi'i: —Agirippa kaananke e kawrital tawaaɓe ɗo! On nji'ii gorko o. Alhuudiyankooɓe fuu pelii mo to am ley Urusaliima e ɗo fuu. Iɓe ƴeewnoo, iɓe mbi'a o haanaa yoppeede o wuura.
44025025	De miin e hoore am kaa, mi tawii o waɗaay fay huunde ko haani warude mo. Ammaa kanko e hoore makko, o nyaagake sariya makko yaaree faa to kaananke Roma mawɗo oon. Ndelle mi anniyake neldude mo toon.
44025026	Ammaa mi walaa ko mi winndana kaananke oon dow kabaaru makko. Ɗum waɗi de ngaddumi mo yeeso mooɗon, e ko ɓuri ɗum fuu, yeeso maaɗa aan kaananke Agirippa. Hono nii, si en kettindake haala makko fu, mi heɓan ko mi winnda.
44025027	Sabo hakkillo am jaɓaay neldude kasunke to kaananke tawee hollitaay ko nanngiraa.
44026001	Agirippa wi'i Pool: —A hokkaama laawol. Haalu haala maa. Ndeen, Pool ɓanti junngom, jaabii, wi'i:
44026002	—Agirippa kaananke, mi seyorake laamnude hoore am yeeso maa hannden ko Alhuudiyankooɓe peldi kam ɗuum fuu.
44026003	Aɗa anndi al'aadaaji Alhuudiyankooɓe e haalaaji muɓɓen fuu. Saabe majjum miɗo nyaage, kettindanoɗaa kam e munyal.
44026004	Alhuudiyankooɓe fuu ina anndi no mbuurdumi gilla mi cukalel. Iɓe anndi no ngorrunoomi e ley yimɓe leydi am e ley Urusaliima fuu.
44026005	Iɓe anndi gilla arande, si ɓe njaɓii seedaade: miɗo jokki laawol diina amin ɓurngol tiiɗude ngol, miɗo hiisodaa e Farisa'en.
44026006	Joonin, mi darake faa mi saree saabe mi yowii jikke am dow amaana mo Laamɗo waɗani maamiraaɓe meeɗen oon.
44026007	Ƴuwdiiji meeɗen sappo e ɗiɗi ɗiin ina njowi jikke muɓɓen e tabintingol amaana oon, ina ndewira semmbe jemma e nyalooma. Kaananke, wo saabe jikke o Alhuudiyankooɓe peldi kam!
44026008	Ko waɗi de miiliɗon Laamɗo waawaa iirtinde maayɓe?
44026009	Miin e hoore am, ley ko faltii mi tannyoriino miɗo haani bonnude innde Iisaa Nasaraatuujo oon, no laatorii fuu.
44026010	Wo ɗum pay ngaɗumi Urusaliima du. Hooreeɓe almaami'en ɓeen kokkii kam baawɗe mi udda seniiɓe heewɓe e kasu. Nde ɓe caranoo faa ɓe mbaree ndeen, mi yardake ɗum.
44026011	Mi torrii ɓe kile keewɗe e cuuɗi baajorɗi ɗiin fuu. Miɗo tilsina ɓe njedda Almasiihu mo ɓe ngoonɗini oon. Tikkere am dow maɓɓe ina mawnunoo sanne, faa miɗo tewna ɓe ley gure janane, miɗo torra ɓe.
44026012	Wo hono nii njaarumi Damas. Hooreeɓe almaami'en nelii kam, kokkii kam baawɗe nanngude goonɗinɓe toon.
44026013	Kaananke, miɗo wonnoo dow laawol wakkati hakkunde naange, nji'umi annoora ina ƴuura dow kammu ina fiiloo kam, miin e yaadiraaɓe am ɓeen fuu. Annoora oon ina ɓuri fay naange jalbude.
44026014	Min fuu, min caami e leydi. Wakkati oon, nanumi daande ina wi'a kam e ley ibraninkoore: «Sool, Sool, ko waɗi de aɗa torra kam? Si ndemoori wi'ii saloto tufirgel joomum fu, ɓeydan nawnaade.»
44026015	Njaabiimi, mbiimi: «Aan wo a moy, joomam?» Joomiraaɗo wi'i: «Miin, wo mi Iisaa mo torrataa oon.
44026016	Umma dara, sabo mi ɓanganii ma, mi suɓake ma faa ngollanaa kam. Wo faa ceedanoɗaa kam ley ko njiiɗaa joonin e ko nji'oytaa si mi ɓangii e maa caggal hannden.
44026017	Mi reenete e Alhuudiyankooɓe e yimɓe lenyi goɗɗi ɓe nulammaami e muɓɓen joonin ɓeen.
